Dried Gamey Meat.description: Dried Gamey Meat is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Soft Meat.name: Dried Soft Meat
Dried Soft Meat.description: Dried Soft Meat is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Stringy Meat.name: Dried Stringy Meat
Dried Stringy Meat.description: Dried Stringy Meat is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried White Meat.name: Dried White Meat
Dried White Meat.description: Dried White Meat is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Electronic Food Trough.name: Electronic Food Trough
Electronic Food Trough.description: All Food Troughs have an allow list for nearby animals that can be accessed by pressing 'X'. To change which animals can eat from a specific food trough, select the animals permitted to eat from the food trough and select "Allowlist-Only Interaction". By default, all nearby animals can eat from food troughs.

Fisher's Module.name: Fisher's Module
Fisher's Module.description: This module increases the user's ability to catch Unique Fish and, somehow, increases the quality of caught fish. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Fisher's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit, which will further increasing the user's ability to fish and become the Master Angler they wish to be.

Fish Chunks.name: Fish Chunks
Fish Chunks.description: Fish Chunks are added to the Prospector's inventory after looting the carcass of a fish. Fish caught using a Fishing Trap or Fishing Rod can be converted into Fish Chunks as well. Fish Chunks can be cooked in a Campfire , or used in other dishes such as Freshwater Fillet Curry or Crumbed Saltwater Fillet . Right-click a Freshwater/Saltwater fish to convert it into Fish Chunks .

Fish Chunk Stew.name: Fish Chunk Stew
Fish Chunk Stew.description: Fish Chunk Stew is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fish Pie.name: Fish Pie
Fish Pie.description: Fish Pie is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fish Trophy Mount.name: Fish Trophy Mount
Fish Trophy Mount.description: The Fish Trophy Mount can be used to display impressive catches with details of the quality, weight, and length of the fish shown. When holding down R, Prospectors can choose between 3 different variants. Fish stored in the Fish Trophy Mount will not spoil. All Fish obtained using a Fishing Rod or Fishing Trap can be placed in the Fish Trophy Mount.

Flatbread.name: Flatbread
Flatbread.description: Flatbread is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Flatbread Dough.name: Flatbread Dough
Flatbread Dough.description: Flatbread Dough is the precursor to the mid/late-game Food Flatbread . Flatbread Dough will eventually decay, but can be preserved in an Ice Box , Refrigerator , or Deep Freeze .

Food Consumption Paste.name: Food Consumption Paste
Food Consumption Paste.description: In-game description: An organic confection that arrests hunger for a limited time. In-game flavor text: Just because it's organic, doesn't mean it's good for you.

Food Trough.name: Food Trough
Food Trough.description: The Food Trough is a basic trough used to feed Mounts / Pets and is recommended if prospectors wish to idly tame a juvenile. Food Troughs benefit from the Extra Space I / Extra Space II talent.

Freshwater Fish Fillet.name: Freshwater Fish Fillet
Freshwater Fish Fillet.description: Freshwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Freshwater Fish at a Basic Fishing Bench . While eating Freshwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount of Hunger , there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook before eating.

Fried Fish Chunks.name: Fried Fish Chunks
Fried Fish Chunks.description: Fried Fish Chunks is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Glass Food Trough.name: Glass Food Trough
Glass Food Trough.description: The Glass Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Food Trough and allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to the Large Food Trough . Glass Food Troughs benefit from the Extra Space I / Extra Space II talent.

Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat.name: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat
Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat.description: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Large Food Trough.name: Large Food Trough
Large Food Trough.description: The Large Food Trough is a slight upgrade to the Food Trough that allows for multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously. Large Food Troughs benefit from the Extra Space I / Extra Space II talent.

Meat Pie.name: Meat Pie
Meat Pie.description: Meat Pie is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Metal Food Trough.name: Metal Food Trough
Metal Food Trough.description: The Metal Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Food Trough and allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to the Large Food Trough . Metal Food Troughs benefit from the Extra Space I / Extra Space II talent.

Mixed Berries.name: Mixed Berries
Mixed Berries.description: Mixed Berries is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Mushroom Soup.name: Mushroom Soup
Mushroom Soup.description: Mushroom Soup is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Mushroom Soup , which increases maximum Health and improves Stamina regeneration.

Potato Bread.name: Potato Bread
Potato Bread.description: Potato Bread is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Prime Meat Attachment.name: Prime Meat Attachment
Prime Meat Attachment.description: Prime Meat Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Pumpkin Bread.name: Pumpkin Bread
Pumpkin Bread.description: Pumpkin Bread is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Raw Bacon.name: Raw Bacon
Raw Bacon.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinning Wild Boar with a Knife . While eating raw food will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook before eating.

Raw Chicken.name: Raw Chicken
Raw Chicken.description: Raw Chicken can be obtained from the carcass of a once cryogenically frozen Chicken that can be purchased from the Workshop .

Raw Copper Lamp.name: Raw Copper Lamp
Raw Copper Lamp.description: The Raw Copper Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Fatty T-Bone.name: Raw Fatty T-Bone
Raw Fatty T-Bone.description: Raw Fatty T-Bone can be obtained by Skinning bears with a Knife .

Raw Gamey Meat.name: Raw Gamey Meat
Raw Gamey Meat.description: Raw Gamey Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with a Knife . Eating Raw Gamey Meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.

Raw Giant Steak.name: Raw Giant Steak
Raw Giant Steak.description: Raw Giant Steak can be obtained by Skinning animals with a Knife . Eating Raw Giant Steak will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.

Raw Gold Lamp.name: Raw Gold Lamp
Raw Gold Lamp.description: The Raw Gold Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Meat.name: Raw Meat
Raw Meat.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinning animals with a Knife . While eating raw meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook before eating.

Raw Oxite Lamp.name: Raw Oxite Lamp
Raw Oxite Lamp.description: The Raw Oxite Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Soft Meat.name: Raw Soft Meat
Raw Soft Meat.description: Raw Soft Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with a Knife . Eating Raw Soft Meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.

Raw Stringy Meat.name: Raw Stringy Meat
Raw Stringy Meat.description: Raw Stringy Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with a Knife . Eating Raw Stringy Meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.

Raw White Meat.name: Raw White Meat
Raw White Meat.description: Eating Raw White Meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.

Refined Wood Fishing Rod.name: Refined Wood Fishing Rod
Refined Wood Fishing Rod.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view this page .

Rhubarb Stew.name: Rhubarb Stew
Rhubarb Stew.description: Rhubarb Stew is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Rotten Meat Lure.name: Rotten Meat Lure
Rotten Meat Lure.description: The Rotten Meat Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Rotten Meat Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Rustic Food Trough.name: Rustic Food Trough
Rustic Food Trough.description: The Rustic Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Food Trough and allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to the Large Food Trough . Rustic Food Troughs benefit from the Extra Space I / Extra Space II talent.

Saltwater Fish Fillet.name: Saltwater Fish Fillet
Saltwater Fish Fillet.description: Saltwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Saltwater Fish at a Basic Fishing Bench . While eating Saltwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount of Hunger , there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook before eating.

Seed Bread.name: Seed Bread
Seed Bread.description: Seed Bread is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Spoiled Meat.name: Spoiled Meat
Spoiled Meat.description: Spoiled Meat is a byproduct of Raw Meat that has been allowed to go rancid. Can be used to make a variety of items, primarily Poison Paste . Requires the You Gonna Eat That? talent for Spoiled Meat to become consumable.

Stew.name: Stew
Stew.description: Stew is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Strawberries & Cream.name: Strawberries & Cream
Strawberries & Cream.description: Strawberries & Cream is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Strawberry.name: Strawberry
Strawberry.description: Strawberry is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Strawberry Farming Packet.name: Strawberry Farming Packet
Strawberry Farming Packet.description: The Strawberry Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Strawberry seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Strawberry Hard Candy.name: Strawberry Hard Candy
Strawberry Hard Candy.description: Strawberry Hard Candy is a consumable food that provides a quick boost of movement speed.

Strawberry Jam.name: Strawberry Jam
Strawberry Jam.description: Strawberry Jam is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Strawberry Jam, Berry Jam and Pickled Carrot , do not spoil and is therefore a valuable food for long-term storage.

Sweetcorn Soup.name: Sweetcorn Soup
Sweetcorn Soup.description: Sweetcorn Soup is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Tomato Soup.name: Tomato Soup
Tomato Soup.description: Tomato Soup is a consumable Food crafted from Tomatoes and Water . As Tomatoes are only found on Prometheus , this recipe requires the New Frontiers DLC to obtain the ingredients.

Volatile Raw Exotics.name: Volatile Raw Exotics
Volatile Raw Exotics.description: While the Exotics prospectors found on Olympus and Styx were originally believed to be the only known variation, the UDA has made a remarkable discovery. This unstable variant is different and appears to have an impact on the local flora not seen before.

Wild Berry.name: Wild Berry
Wild Berry.description: Wild Berry are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenish both Hunger and Thirst .

Wooden Fishing Rod.name: Wooden Fishing Rod
Wooden Fishing Rod.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view this page .

Antibiotic Paste.name: Antibiotic Paste
Antibiotic Paste.description: Antibiotic Paste reduces the duration of bacterial infections like food poisoning and the Cave Sickness debuff from caves by 50% upon consumption.

Antibiotic Pill.name: Antibiotic Pill
Antibiotic Pill.description: Antibiotic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such as Cave Sickness , Infected Wounds , and Food Poisoning .

Antibiotic Tonic.name: Antibiotic Tonic
Antibiotic Tonic.description: Used alone to cure infections such as Cave Sickness , Infected Wound , and Food poisoning , or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylactic Antibiotic Pill .

Anti-Parasitic Paste.name: Anti-Parasitic Paste
Anti-Parasitic Paste.description: Anti-Parasitic Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the Tier 1  tech tree. Reduces the duration of the Parasites debuff upon consumption.

Anti-Poison Paste.name: Anti-Poison Paste
Anti-Poison Paste.description: Anti-Poison Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the tier 1 tech tree. Reduces the duration of Poison from critters like the Venomous Fish or the Caveworm .

Basic Bandage.name: Basic Bandage
Basic Bandage.description: Basic Bandage is used to heal Wound and Exotic Wound Status Effects .

Blood Thinning Paste.name: Blood Thinning Paste
Blood Thinning Paste.description: Blood Thinning Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the Tier 1  tech tree. Reduces the duration of Concussions and Contusions when you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree.

Carbon Paste.name: Carbon Paste
Carbon Paste.description: Carbon Paste is a crafted resource meant to be smelted in a Concrete Furnace or Electric Furnace to make Carbon Fiber and is a critical component in Tier 4  crafting.

Composite Paste.name: Composite Paste
Composite Paste.description: Composite Paste is an end-game crafted resource which can be smelted into Composites inside of the Electric Furnace .

Cooling Bandage.name: Cooling Bandage
Cooling Bandage.description: The Cooling Bandage is used to heal Heatstroke, Heat Exhaustion and Exotic Overheat Status Effects . If the Prospector's core temperature is still extremely high, the cooling bandage will not remove these debuffs.

Cured Leather.name: Cured Leather
Cured Leather.description: Cured Leather is a crafted resource used in various Tier 3  Armors and Tools . Below is a list of armors that use Cured Leather:
Cured Leather.crafted_at: Crafted atDrying RackSmokerAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atDrying RackSmokerAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Cured Leather Lure.name: Cured Leather Lure
Cured Leather Lure.description: The Cured Leather Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Cured Leather Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Health Buff Paste.name: Health Buff Paste
Health Buff Paste.description: In-game description: An organic preparation that temporarily increases health. In-game flavor text: Like so many things on Icarus, the exact ingredients would probably render this concoction illegal on Earth.

Health Regeneration Paste.name: Health Regeneration Paste
Health Regeneration Paste.description: In-game description: A herbal confection that speeds healing. In-game flavor text: The lily's high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.

Health Restoration Paste.name: Health Restoration Paste
Health Restoration Paste.description: In-game description: An organic fusion that restores health. In-game flavor text: The combination of Icarus's unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of 'useful' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.

Heat Bandage.name: Heat Bandage
Heat Bandage.description: Heat Bandage is used to heal Frostbite, Frosty and Exotic Chill Status Effects . If the Prospector's core temperature is still freezing, the heat bandage will not remove these debuffs.

Oxygen Buff Paste.name: Oxygen Buff Paste
Oxygen Buff Paste.description: In-game description: A natural concoction that increases available oxygen. In-game flavor text: Your parents are a long way from here. What you do with your body is your business.

Oxygen Consumption Paste.name: Oxygen Consumption Paste
Oxygen Consumption Paste.description: In-game description: A natural beta blocker. In-game flavor text: This preparation reduces the heart rate, dropping oxygen consumption temporarily.

Oxygen Restoration Paste.name: Oxygen Restoration Paste
Oxygen Restoration Paste.description: In-game description: An organic co-factor that rapidly restores oxygen. In-game flavor text: Helper molecule

Poison Paste.name: Poison Paste
Poison Paste.description: Poison Paste is used for making a variety of items, such as medicines like Anti-Poison Pill or ammo like Poison Arrow .

Shengong \"Yeying\" Bandage.name: Shengong "Yeying" Bandage
Shengong \"Yeying\" Bandage.description: The Shengong "Yeying" Bandage is an overly priced Basic Bandage purchased from the Workshop that will remove the Bleeding modifier when consumed.

Stamina Buff Paste.name: Stamina Buff Paste
Stamina Buff Paste.description: In-game description: A herbal concoction, temporarily increasing stamina. In-game flavor text: While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the 'wakers' once offered to long haul space pilots.

Stamina Consumption Paste.name: Stamina Consumption Paste
Stamina Consumption Paste.description: In-game description: A biotic compound that slows stamina loss temporarily. In-game flavor text: The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.

Stamina Regeneration Paste.name: Stamina Regeneration Paste
Stamina Regeneration Paste.description: In-game description: An organic stimulant that accelerates stamina recovery. In-game flavor text: A herbal preparation that acts rapidly on the sympathetic nervous system, increasing noradrenergic activity.

Stamina Restoration Paste.name: Stamina Restoration Paste
Stamina Restoration Paste.description: In-game description: A natural stimulant that restores lost stamina. In-game flavor text: As countless athletes, party-goers and would-be mystics have noted, the line between natural stimulant and highly addictive narcotic is arbitrary, at best.

Water Consumption Paste.name: Water Consumption Paste
Water Consumption Paste.description: In-game description: A natural preparation, temporarily reducing the body's need for water. In-game flavor text: The key word here is 'temporarily'.

Composite Dropship Recall Beacon.name: Composite Dropship Recall Beacon
Composite Dropship Recall Beacon.description: The Composite Dropship Recall Beacon will fire a flare that calls the Prospectors dropship to that location when thrown, which can either be used for immediate extraction or left there for use later on. Multiple Recall Beacons can be used per session, however, these are one-use items, so use them carefully. Items stored in the dropships inventory will not be lost when the dropship is called, allowing Prospectors to transport equipment/resources over large distances.

Makeshift Landmine.name: Makeshift Landmine
Makeshift Landmine.description: Prospectors on mounts and mounts themselves do not trigger Landmines. Prospectors, however, can trigger and detonate Landmines with a Yellow/Red indicator. All Landmines can be picked up and disarmed, regardless of their current state. Press and hold X to pickup and disarm Landmines. Note: once triggered, Makeshift Landmines will detonate if a Prospector/animal (excluding mounts) is nearby. They can be picked up and disarmed, but Prospectors run the risk of detonating the Landmine.

Miner's Module.name: Miner's Module
Miner's Module.description: This module is the Workshop equivalent of the Supplemental Respiration Attachment , with the added damage bonus to Caveworms . It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Miner's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase benefits received from the modules.

Prototype Trail Beacon.name: Prototype Trail Beacon
Prototype Trail Beacon.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon is a small portable self-powered beacon that is deployed with the Prototype Trail Beacon Tool to form a breadcrumb trail in the uncharted areas of the Null Sector Region on Prometheus .

Prototype Trail Beacon Tool.name: Prototype Trail Beacon Tool
Prototype Trail Beacon Tool.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon Tool is a handheld device used to place a breadcrumb trail of Prototype Trail Beacons when exploring the Null Sector Region on the Prometheus map.

Scorpion Pincer Trap.name: Scorpion Pincer Trap
Scorpion Pincer Trap.description: Scorpion Pincer Traps are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment. The recipe blueprint to craft this defensive trap is only unlocked after completing the prospect Carapace: Research . The blueprint unlocks account-wide once the mission is completed.

Snare Trap.name: Snare Trap
Snare Trap.description: The Snare Trap is a deployable item used to trap and tame certain animals on Icarus. It must be filled with suitable Animal Bait and placed in an area to attract the desired animal.

12-Gauge Casing.name: 12-Gauge Casing
12-Gauge Casing.description: The 12-Gauge Casing is a vital component used in the crafting of 12-Gauge Buckshot Shells and 12-Gauge Slugs .

12-Gauge Slug.name: 12-Gauge Slug
12-Gauge Slug.description: 12-Gauge Slugs are used by the Shotguns . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

Acidic Glands.name: Acidic Glands
Acidic Glands.description: Acidic Glands can be taken to an Organic Residue Cleanser to be turned into 5x Animal Fat . Hazardous when carried in small amounts, deadly when carried in large quantities/with several other Miasmic items. Despite the risk, Acidic Glands is an excellent source of Animal Fat .

AdLift Module.name: AdLift Module
AdLift Module.description: This module increases the user's weight capacity by 15% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Ad Lift Modules may be equipped if the prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the amount the user can carry.

Advanced Aquarium.name: Advanced Aquarium
Advanced Aquarium.description: The Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units of Power and a water network providing at least 500 units of Water . The Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Advanced Aquarium can store 4 fish.

Advanced Battery Rack.name: Advanced Battery Rack
Advanced Battery Rack.description: The Advanced Battery Rack is a power-storing device that must be placed indoors. It can store up to 6,000k Ws of power and can charge/output power at a max rate of 10,000 Watts per second.

Advanced Creature Deterrent.name: Advanced Creature Deterrent
Advanced Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Advanced Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning of Fauna so be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Advanced Storm Visor Attachment.name: Advanced Storm Visor Attachment
Advanced Storm Visor Attachment.description: The Advanced Storm Visor Attachment is an end-game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Advanced Armor Attachment Packs in the Tier 4  Tech Tree.

Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachm.name: Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachment
Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachm.description: The Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachment is an armor alteration that provides resistance to poison and reduced water consumption.

Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attach.name: Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attachment
Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attach.description: The Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attachment is an end-game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Advanced Armor Attachment Packs in the Tier 4  Tech Tree.

Advanced Tool Attachment Pack.name: Advanced Tool Attachment Pack
Advanced Tool Attachment Pack.description: The Advanced Tool Attachment Pack is a Tier 4  item that allows Prospectors to alter their tools with additional bonuses. Similar to Tool Attachment Pack , both can be applied at an Alteration Bench or Advanced Alteration Bench .

Aerodynamic Attachment.name: Aerodynamic Attachment
Aerodynamic Attachment.description: Aerodynamic Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Alpha Wolf Trophy.name: Alpha Wolf Trophy
Alpha Wolf Trophy.description: Alpha Wolf Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Animal Bait.name: Animal Bait
Animal Bait.description: Animal Bait is used to lure random predators when left in an open area. The blueprint is unlocked account-wide after completing the prospect Wet Work: Extermination . Stacks up to 5.

Animal Fat.name: Animal Fat
Animal Fat.description: Animal fat is produced from the rendering down of raw meat and is used in Cooking to make late-game Foods such as Pastry , Fried Chunky Vegetables and, Freshwater Fillet Curry . It is used to create and power the Lantern .

Animal Healthbar Module.name: Animal Healthbar Module
Animal Healthbar Module.description: This module allows the wearer to see creature alert level and health when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. The Animal Healthbar Module is researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect.

Animal Highlighting Module.name: Animal Highlighting Module
Animal Highlighting Module.description: Animal Highlighting Module is researched and created on the Space Station in the Workshop . Equip in an Envirosuit Module Slot after dropping down for a prospect.

Antelope Trophy.name: Antelope Trophy
Antelope Trophy.description: Antelope Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Anti-Parasitic Pill.name: Anti-Parasitic Pill
Anti-Parasitic Pill.description: Anti-Parasitic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such as Festering Wounds and Dysentery .

Anti-Parasitic Tonic.name: Anti-Parasitic Tonic
Anti-Parasitic Tonic.description: Used alone to cure parasitic infections such as Festering Wound and Dysentery or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylactic Anti-Parasitic Pill

Anti-Poison Pill.name: Anti-Poison Pill
Anti-Poison Pill.description: Anti-Poison Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments from contact with poisonous substances.

Anti-Poison Tonic.name: Anti-Poison Tonic
Anti-Poison Tonic.description: Used alone to cure Poison from critters like the Venomous Fish , or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylactic Anti-poison Pill .

Aquarium.name: Aquarium
Aquarium.description: The Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Aquarium will not spoil so long as there is biofuel available and the Aquarium is connected to a water network providing at least 250 units of water. The Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. With a full Biofuel Can , the Aquarium will last about three and a half hours. Can only hold 1 fish.

Archer's Backpack.name: Archer's Backpack
Archer's Backpack.description: The Archer's Backpack is a must need for the avid archer, quickly dispatch a flurry of arrows at your target with this innovative quiver system.

Arctic Animal Feed.name: Arctic Animal Feed
Arctic Animal Feed.description: Arctic Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Arctic Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Arctic Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Arctic Scorpion Trophy.name: Arctic Scorpion Trophy
Arctic Scorpion Trophy.description: Arctic Scorpion Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Arctic Survival Saddle.name: Arctic Survival Saddle
Arctic Survival Saddle.description: The Arctic Survival Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has +2 heavy cargo slots and attributes for arctic survival.

Arctic Vesper Trophy.name: Arctic Vesper Trophy
Arctic Vesper Trophy.description: An Arctic Vesper Trophy is a decorative deployable that can be placed on any wall surface and is used to liven any living space.

Arid Striker Trophy.name: Arid Striker Trophy
Arid Striker Trophy.description: Arid Striker Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Art Deco 2-Seater Couch.name: Art Deco 2-Seater Couch
Art Deco 2-Seater Couch.description: The Art Deco 2-Seater Couch is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco 3-Seater Couch.name: Art Deco 3-Seater Couch
Art Deco 3-Seater Couch.description: The Art Deco 3-Seater Couch is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Bookshelf.name: Art Deco Bookshelf
Art Deco Bookshelf.description: The Art Deco Bookshelf is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Chandelier.name: Art Deco Chandelier
Art Deco Chandelier.description: The Art Deco Chandelier is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Dresser.name: Art Deco Dresser
Art Deco Dresser.description: The Art Deco Dresser is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Fireplace.name: Art Deco Fireplace
Art Deco Fireplace.description: The Art Deco Fireplace is a gilded sleek stone fireplace that provides a source of Heat , Light , Coziness and a place to cook indoors without the hazards of an open Campfire .

Art Deco Fireplace Cap.name: Art Deco Fireplace Cap
Art Deco Fireplace Cap.description: The Art Deco Fireplace Cap is a final cap for placing on a Art Deco Fireplace Extension or Art Deco Fireplace . Two build variants are available via the 'R' key.

Art Deco Fireplace Extension.name: Art Deco Fireplace Extension
Art Deco Fireplace Extension.description: The Art Deco Fireplace Extension is a gilded section of chimney that is placed on an Art Deco Fireplace and usually capped with an Art Deco Fireplace Cap . Two build variants are available via the 'R' key.

Art Deco Nightstand.name: Art Deco Nightstand
Art Deco Nightstand.description: The Art Deco Nightstand is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Partition.name: Art Deco Partition
Art Deco Partition.description: The Art Deco Partition is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Rug.name: Art Deco Rug
Art Deco Rug.description: The Art Deco Rug is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Safe.name: Art Deco Safe
Art Deco Safe.description: The Art Deco Safe is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Vase.name: Art Deco Vase
Art Deco Vase.description: The Art Deco Vase is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Vault.name: Art Deco Vault
Art Deco Vault.description: The Art Deco Vault is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Wardrobe.name: Art Deco Wardrobe
Art Deco Wardrobe.description: The Art Deco Wardrobe is an gilded item of significant worth.

Ashen Drake Trophy.name: Ashen Drake Trophy
Ashen Drake Trophy.description: Ashen Drake Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Attack Speed Attachment.name: Attack Speed Attachment
Attack Speed Attachment.description: Attack Speed Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Avocado.name: Avocado
Avocado.description: Avocado is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Avocado Farming Packet.name: Avocado Farming Packet
Avocado Farming Packet.description: The Avocado Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station or the Orbital Exchange Interface and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Avocado seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Bacon Butty.name: Bacon Butty
Bacon Butty.description: Bacon Butty is a consumable food that boosts health, stamina, health regeneration, experience gained and critical damage.

Banana.name: Banana
Banana.description: A Banana is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. It can be eaten to boost maximum stamina for 60 seconds and to satisfy Hunger .

Banana Farming Packet.name: Banana Farming Packet
Banana Farming Packet.description: The Banana Farming Packet is a packet of seeds for planting and growing Bananas . It is unlocked in the Workshop after completing the mission Ape Escape in the Great Hunts Campaigns .

Barbecue Carrot.name: Barbecue Carrot
Barbecue Carrot.description: Barbecue Carrot is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Bark Lure.name: Bark Lure
Bark Lure.description: The Bark Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Bark Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Basic Battery Rack.name: Basic Battery Rack
Basic Battery Rack.description: The Basic Battery Rack is a power-storing device that must be placed indoors. It can store up to 1,000k Ws of power and can charge/output power at a max rate of 1,500 Watts per second.

Basic Fertilizer.name: Basic Fertilizer
Basic Fertilizer.description: Basic Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the growth of plants. When applied, Crop Yield and Crop Growth Speed is increased by 15% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

Basic Rainwater Purifier.name: Basic Rainwater Purifier
Basic Rainwater Purifier.description: Basic Rainwater Purifiers can be crafted using Character Crafting with the following resources:

Basic Riding Saddle.name: Basic Riding Saddle
Basic Riding Saddle.description: The Basic Riding Saddle is an item that allows prospectors to ride tamed Mounts . The Basic Riding Saddle can be use on all Mounts (regardless of who tamed them) and comes with two inventory slots and one heavy cargo inventory slot for Equipment . Items stored in the saddle is dropped into a lootable overflow bag when the mount dies.

Basic Scope Attachment.name: Basic Scope Attachment
Basic Scope Attachment.description: Basic Scope Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech. Does not add actual scope to weapon.

Basic Water Purifier.name: Basic Water Purifier
Basic Water Purifier.description: Basic Water Purifiers can be crafted using Character Crafting with the following resources:

Battery Cavelight.name: Battery Cavelight
Battery Cavelight.description: The Battery Cavelight is a portable Light Source that can be deployed on a floor or wall to provide illumination in the surrounding area. It is good for marking a path through caves.

Battery Spotlight.name: Battery Spotlight
Battery Spotlight.description: The Battery Spotlight is a portable Light Source that can be deployed on a floor or wall to provide illumination in a concentrated area. It is useful as a temporary light source while mining in caves.

Bean Farming Packet.name: Bean Farming Packet
Bean Farming Packet.description: The Bean Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Bean seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Bear Rug.name: Bear Rug
Bear Rug.description: Bear Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Bear Rug.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Bear Trophy.name: Bear Trophy
Bear Trophy.description: Bear Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

BEAST.name: BEAST
BEAST.description: While holding the BEAST, Prospectors can left-click while looking at an animal to "scan" that animal (must be close to the target to initiate a scan). Unlike what the description says, the scanned animal will take additional damage until another scan is performed. Scanning animals using the BEAST also grants 3 bestiary points for the animal scanned.

Beehive.name: Beehive
Beehive.description: The Beehive is the foundation for Beekeeping all other units attach to the hive. The base model uses Worker Bees or Queen Bees as fuel to produce Honeycomb . Honeycomb is produced at 1 unit per min.

Beehive Breeding Center.name: Beehive Breeding Center
Beehive Breeding Center.description: A Beekeeping element that attaches to a Beehive and provides the facilities for a Queen Bee to produce Worker Bees

Beehive Extractor.name: Beehive Extractor
Beehive Extractor.description: A Beekeeping element that attaches to a small Beehive to automatically extract Honey and Beeswax from Honeycomb . Requires power and is attached through the small Beehive GUI.

Beer.name: Beer
Beer.description: Beer is a mid-game beverage made from Yeast and Wheat that greatly increases stamina and stamina regeneration.
Beer.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

Big Breakfast.name: Big Breakfast
Big Breakfast.description: Big Breakfast is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Binoculars.name: Binoculars
Binoculars.description: See your prey from further away.

Biofuel.name: Biofuel
Biofuel.description: Biofuel is a mid-game, Tier 3  fuel that can be crafted or purchased and used to fuel a variety of Deployable equipment and sometimes quest items seen in Missions .

Biofuel Bio-Cleaner.name: Biofuel Bio-Cleaner
Biofuel Bio-Cleaner.description: The Biofuel Bio-Cleaner is a deployable Tier 3  cleaning device that can process organic materials collected from world bosses into Legendary Biomass and clean infected materials found on Prometheus , similar to the Tier 4  Organic Residue Cleanser .

Biofuel Can.name: Biofuel Can
Biofuel Can.description: Biofuel Can is used to store Biofuel . It is filled at either the Biofuel Composter or Electric Composter .

Biofuel Chimney Cap.name: Biofuel Chimney Cap
Biofuel Chimney Cap.description: A Biofuel Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on a Biofuel Chimney Extension or directly on a Biofuel Fireplace . Two variants, a half height and full height, are available by holding the 'R' key when deploying.

Biofuel Chimney Extension.name: Biofuel Chimney Extension
Biofuel Chimney Extension.description: A Biofuel Chimney Extension is a wide round section of metal chimney or stove pipe to place on a Biofuel Fireplace or another existing Biofuel Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with a Biofuel Chimney Cap .

Biofuel Composter.name: Biofuel Composter
Biofuel Composter.description: The Biofuel Composter enables the Prospector to produce Biofuel . Can be connected to a water network providing at least 100 units of water to increase processing speed, but is not required to produce Biofuel.

Biofuel Fireplace.name: Biofuel Fireplace
Biofuel Fireplace.description: The Biofuel Fireplace is deployable Tier 3  version of the Fireplace that burns Biofuel to provide a source of heat, a source of light , Coziness and a means to cook Food indoors.

Biofuel Generator.name: Biofuel Generator
Biofuel Generator.description: The Biofuel Generator generates Electricity when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can . Use an Electricity Tool to connect it to Benches to provide power.

Biofuel Lamp.name: Biofuel Lamp
Biofuel Lamp.description: Provides exceptional lightning compared to the Torch or Lantern . Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar.

Biofuel Oxite Dissolver.name: Biofuel Oxite Dissolver
Biofuel Oxite Dissolver.description: More efficient than the Oxite Dissolver , this is used in tandem with Oxygen Containers placed into the oxidizer. The front slots of the deployable only accept Oxygen Containers and will automatically fill said containers from Oxite placed into the machine when supplied with Biofuel from a Biofuel Can . A full Biofuel Can will last three minutes and twenty seconds, producing 0.2 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.

Biofuel Stove.name: Biofuel Stove
Biofuel Stove.description: The Biofuel Stove is a mid- to late-game technology that expands the recipes available compared to the Potbelly Stove . It requires Biofuel to run and must be snapped to a side of the Kitchen Bench .

Biofuel Water Pump.name: Biofuel Water Pump
Biofuel Water Pump.description: The Biofuel Water Pump outputs 1,000 Water when supplied with biofuel; use the Water Pipe Tool to connect it to Crafting Benches / Water Storage to provide water. The Biofuel Water Pump can output water for two hours and thirty minutes with a full Biofuel Can .

Biotech Maul.name: Biotech Maul
Biotech Maul.description: The Biotech Maul is a heavy melee-focused Legendary Weapon that can be purchased at the Bio-lab .

Black Jaguar Trophy.name: Black Jaguar Trophy
Black Jaguar Trophy.description: Black Jaguar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Black Wolf Lure.name: Black Wolf Lure
Black Wolf Lure.description: The Black Wolf Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Black Wolf Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Black Wolf Tooth.name: Black Wolf Tooth
Black Wolf Tooth.description: Black Wolf Teeth are a resource obtained by skinning an Alpha Wolf . Only after completing Lupine: Extermination can these be used to craft new weaponry at the Anvil Bench .

Blood Thinning Pill.name: Blood Thinning Pill
Blood Thinning Pill.description: Blood Thinning Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further Contusions and Concussions .

Blood Thinning Tonic.name: Blood Thinning Tonic
Blood Thinning Tonic.description: Used alone to treat trauma such as Concussion and Contusion , when you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree, or as a mid-stage ingredient to craft the Blood Thinning Pill .

Blueback Trophy.name: Blueback Trophy
Blueback Trophy.description: Blueback Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Blue Reed Lure.name: Blue Reed Lure
Blue Reed Lure.description: The Blue Reed Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Blue Reed Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Bovine Pack Harness.name: Bovine Pack Harness
Bovine Pack Harness.description: The Bovine Pack Harness is a cargo saddle for Buffalo and Tusker that has 22 inventory slots and +300 Kg weight capacity.

Bramble Farming Packet.name: Bramble Farming Packet
Bramble Farming Packet.description: The Bramble Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Bramble seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Broiled Kumara.name: Broiled Kumara
Broiled Kumara.description: Broiled Kumara is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Broken Pottery.name: Broken Pottery
Broken Pottery.description: The Broken Pottery is an item unlocked by completing the Fracture mission. There are four varieties of pottery selectable by 'R'.

Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue.name: Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue
Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue.description: The Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Bear Statue.name: Bronze Bear Statue
Bronze Bear Statue.description: The Bronze Bear Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Cougar Statue.name: Bronze Cougar Statue
Bronze Cougar Statue.description: The Bronze Cougar Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Elephant Statue.name: Bronze Elephant Statue
Bronze Elephant Statue.description: The Bronze Elephant Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Hyena Statue.name: Bronze Hyena Statue
Bronze Hyena Statue.description: The Bronze Hyena Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Jaguar Statue.name: Bronze Jaguar Statue
Bronze Jaguar Statue.description: The Bronze Jaguar Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Polar Bear Statue.name: Bronze Polar Bear Statue
Bronze Polar Bear Statue.description: The Bronze Polar Bear Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Scorpion Statue.name: Bronze Scorpion Statue
Bronze Scorpion Statue.description: The Bronze Scorpion Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Snow Leopard Statue.name: Bronze Snow Leopard Statue
Bronze Snow Leopard Statue.description: The Bronze Snow Leopard Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Brutalist 2-Seater Couch.name: Brutalist 2-Seater Couch
Brutalist 2-Seater Couch.description: The Brutalist 2-Seater Couch is a couch made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist 3-Seater Couch.name: Brutalist 3-Seater Couch
Brutalist 3-Seater Couch.description: The Brutalist 3-Seater Couch is a couch made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus to Coziness . The Brutalist 3-Seater Couch is part of the Industrial Furniture Pack DLC.

Brutalist Bookshelf.name: Brutalist Bookshelf
Brutalist Bookshelf.description: The Brutalist Bookshelf is mode from concrete and iron.

Brutalist Display Cabinet.name: Brutalist Display Cabinet
Brutalist Display Cabinet.description: The Brutalist Display Cabinet is made from concrete and iron, and serves as decorative shelving and a display cabinet. It has 25 inventory slots for Storage and provides a small bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist Dresser.name: Brutalist Dresser
Brutalist Dresser.description: The Brutalist Dresser is a concrete bedroom furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 10 inventory slots for Storage and provides a small bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist Lamp.name: Brutalist Lamp
Brutalist Lamp.description: The Brutalist Lamp is a table lamp with a concrete base and round shade in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It requires 150 units of Electricity to operate and provides a Light Source and bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist Nightstand.name: Brutalist Nightstand
Brutalist Nightstand.description: The Brutalist Nightstand is a concrete bedside furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 10 inventory slots for Storage and provides a small bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist Square Lamp.name: Brutalist Square Lamp
Brutalist Square Lamp.description: The Brutalist Square Lamp is a table lamp with a concrete base and a square shade (despite the appearance of the in-game item icon) in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It requires 150 units of Electricity to operate and provides a Light Source and bonus to Coziness .

Brutalist Stool.name: Brutalist Stool
Brutalist Stool.description: The Brutalist Stool seats one and is made from concrete.

Brutalist Wardrobe.name: Brutalist Wardrobe
Brutalist Wardrobe.description: The Brutalist Wardrobe is a concrete bedside furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 25 inventory slots for Storage and provides a small bonus to Coziness . The deployable has two varieties selectable by the 'R' key.

Buffalo Rug.name: Buffalo Rug
Buffalo Rug.description: Buffalo Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Buffalo Rug.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Buffalo Trophy.name: Buffalo Trophy
Buffalo Trophy.description: Buffalo Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Building Upgrade Tool.name: Building Upgrade Tool
Building Upgrade Tool.description: This item is no longer craftable. Upgrade functionality has been merged with all repair hammers: prospectors can hold R to select a building material and Right-Click Building Pieces to apply the upgrade if they have the new building pieces in their inventory.

Bullseye Target.name: Bullseye Target
Bullseye Target.description: Bullseye Targets are deployable items used for target practice and to test weapon damage.

Butter.name: Butter
Butter.description: Butter is a late-game intermediate resource crafted from Cream and used in various recipes.

C0NT4CT Radio.name: C0NT4CT Radio
C0NT4CT Radio.description: The C0NT4CT Radio is a portable device that when in range, provides the same access to missions as a CONT4CT Device in Open World prospects.

Cacoa Farming Packet.name: Cacoa Farming Packet
Cacoa Farming Packet.description: The Cacoa Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Cocoa seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Calibrated Grip Attachment.name: Calibrated Grip Attachment
Calibrated Grip Attachment.description: Calibrated Grip Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech. It is worth noting that The Wear Rate reduction applies to weapons as well as tools.

Campfire.name: Campfire
Campfire.description: The first available cooking station, the campfire is an essential early structure that allows prospectors to pass the night and to cook Raw Meat or Fish Chunks , yielding safe to consume versions.

Canteen.name: Canteen
Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including a Rain Reservoir . The Canteen is water tight, and is a mid-game item requiring a Machining Bench . Canteens can hold 5.0 L of water, 5 times as much as a water skin and can keep the Prospector hydrated for approximately 10x as long due to the leakage of the water skin.

Caramel Pastry.name: Caramel Pastry
Caramel Pastry.description: Caramel Pastry is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Carbon Javelin.name: Carbon Javelin
Carbon Javelin.description: The Carbon Javelin is a variant of the Carbon Spear that can only be thrown and is a cheaper upgrade to the Platinum Javelin that deals more damage and has a lower break chance.

Carrot Cake.name: Carrot Cake
Carrot Cake.description: Carrot Cake is a deployable Food item that when placed on a surface will provide 8 Carrot Cake Pieces that can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Carrot Cake Piece.name: Carrot Cake Piece
Carrot Cake Piece.description: Carrot Cake Piece is a late-game Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Carrot Farming Packet.name: Carrot Farming Packet
Carrot Farming Packet.description: The Carrot Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Carrot seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Caveworm Javelin.name: Caveworm Javelin
Caveworm Javelin.description: The Caveworm Javelin is a variant of the Caveworm Spear that can only be thrown. Although Javelins have a moderate charge time and projectile travel time, they are one of the highest damage-dealing weapons in Icarus and are devastating when mastered. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to twenty.

Caveworm Trophy.name: Caveworm Trophy
Caveworm Trophy.description: Caveworm Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Cave Survival Inhaler.name: Cave Survival Inhaler
Cave Survival Inhaler.description: The Cave Survival Inhaler is a Medicine that boosts resistance to Cave Sickness , increases health and stamina regeneration in caves and adds a 15% chance to harvest additional Stone when mining.

Cement Mixer.name: Cement Mixer
Cement Mixer.description: The Cement Mixer allows the Prospector to craft Concrete Mix , and Concrete Building Pieces .

Chala Trophy.name: Chala Trophy
Chala Trophy.description: Chala Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Chamois Trophy.name: Chamois Trophy
Chamois Trophy.description: Chamois Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Charcoal.name: Charcoal
Charcoal.description: Charcoal is a basic resource used for a variety of items, ranging from Gunpowder to end-game medicines like Antibiotic Pill . It is obtained either as a byproduct of burning wood in a Crafting/Cooking Bench or Furnace that requires wood as a fuel, also it can be obtained from felling a fully burnt tree.

Chargrilled Chicken.name: Chargrilled Chicken
Chargrilled Chicken.description: Chargrilled Chicken is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Charred Corn.name: Charred Corn
Charred Corn.description: Charred Corn is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Cheese.name: Cheese
Cheese.description: Cheese is a consumable food that boosts stamina and health regeneration.

Cheese Pizza Slice.name: Cheese Pizza Slice
Cheese Pizza Slice.description: Cheese Pizza Slice is a late-game Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. It provides a boost to health, stamina, stamina regeneration and experience gained and granted to allies.

Cheese Roll.name: Cheese Roll
Cheese Roll.description: Cheese Roll is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Chewy Coconut Cookie.name: Chewy Coconut Cookie
Chewy Coconut Cookie.description: Chewy Coconut Cookie is a late-game Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Chimney Cap.name: Chimney Cap
Chimney Cap.description: A Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on a Chimney Extension or directly on a Fireplace . A smaller variant, the Chimney Cap Half can also be used for the same purpose.

Chimney Cap Half.name: Chimney Cap Half
Chimney Cap Half.description: A Chimney Cap Half is a decorative final cap piece to place on a Chimney Extension or directly on a Fireplace . It is the smaller variant of the Chimney Cap , but with less vertical height.

Chimney Extension.name: Chimney Extension
Chimney Extension.description: A Chimney Extension is a decorative section of stone chimney to place on a Fireplace or another existing Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with a Chimney Cap or Chimney Cap Half .

Chocolate Cake.name: Chocolate Cake
Chocolate Cake.description: Chocolate Cake is a deployable Food item that when placed on a surface will provide 8 Chocolate Cake Pieces that can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Chocolate Cake Piece.name: Chocolate Cake Piece
Chocolate Cake Piece.description: Chocolate Cake Piece is a late-game Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Choc-Chip Cookie.name: Choc-Chip Cookie
Choc-Chip Cookie.description: Choc-Chip Cookie is late-game Food that when consumed provides a considerable boost to stamina, charge speed, reload speed and a chance to mine additional stone.

Classic Rustic Sign.name: Classic Rustic Sign
Classic Rustic Sign.description: A Classic Rustic Sign made of wood.

Clay.name: Clay
Clay.description: A moldable, fine-grained material that can be baked into bricks. Clay is found in the Swamp Biome in Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using a Sledgehammer . Clay can be refined into Clay Bricks at any furnace.

Clay Brick.name: Clay Brick
Clay Brick.description: Clay Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craft Clay Brick Building Pieces at an Advanced Masonry Bench / Electric Masonry Bench .
Clay Brick.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

Coconut Cake.name: Coconut Cake
Coconut Cake.description: Coconut Cake is a deployable Food item that when placed on a surface will provide 8 Coconut Cake Pieces that can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Coconut Cake Piece.name: Coconut Cake Piece
Coconut Cake Piece.description: Coconut Cake Piece is a late-game Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Coffee Farming Packet.name: Coffee Farming Packet
Coffee Farming Packet.description: The Coffee Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Coffee seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Cold Survival Inhaler.name: Cold Survival Inhaler
Cold Survival Inhaler.description: The Cold Survival Inhaler is a Medicine that boosts resistance to cold, damage from frost and the Hypothermia Status Effect .

Composites.name: Composites
Composites.description: Composites are an end-game crafted material used to make Tier 4  Armors and various Weapons / Deployables . Prospectors require a Material Processor , an Electric Furnace , and Power .

Composite Javelin.name: Composite Javelin
Composite Javelin.description: The Composite Javelin is a variant of the Composite Spear that can only be thrown and is the highest damage dealing Javelin currently available. Despite the heavy tech investment to reach Composites , Composite Javelins are far cheaper to craft than the Titanium Javelin and are worth the investment for the increased damage and low projectile break chance.

Composite Tactical Shield.name: Composite Tactical Shield
Composite Tactical Shield.description: The Composite Tactical Shield is crafted at the Foundry with the following resources:

Concrete Mix.name: Concrete Mix
Concrete Mix.description: Concrete Mix is used widely in crafting of items such as Concrete Building Pieces , Concrete Furnace , and the Fabricator .

Condensed Enzymes.name: Condensed Enzymes
Condensed Enzymes.description: Condensed Enzymes are a unique resource in Icarus, introduced as part of the horde events. These geysers are scattered across various biomes. To trigger the event, players need to deploy a Vapor Condenser (crafted at the Fabricator ) on top of an Enzyme Geysers . Successfully completing the event typically rewards players with Exotics ; however, once the reward cap of three Exotics is reached, further completions will yield Condensed Enzymes instead.

CONT4CT Device.name: CONT4CT Device
CONT4CT Device.description: The CONT4CT Device grants Prospectors access to SMPL3 missions and Operations . Though the CONT4CT Device can be crafted in Missions , they can only be used in Open Worlds and Outposts . Must be deployed outdoors.

Corn Farming Packet.name: Corn Farming Packet
Corn Farming Packet.description: The Corn Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Corn seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Cougar Rug.name: Cougar Rug
Cougar Rug.description: Cougar Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Cougar Rug.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Cougar Trophy.name: Cougar Trophy
Cougar Trophy.description: Cougar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Crafting.name: Crafting
Crafting.description: Crafting is the skill that enables many of the other ways prospectors pursue their goals on Icarus. While they can gather Food with their bare hands, and can attempt to Hunt with their fists, everything they attempt on the moon's surface is facilitated by crafting.

Cream.name: Cream
Cream.description: Cream is a late-game intermediate resource crafted from Milk and used in various recipes.

Creamed Corn.name: Creamed Corn
Creamed Corn.description: Creamed Corn is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Creamed Corn , which increases maximum Health and Stamina and reduces the Stamina consumed by actions.

Crispy Bacon.name: Crispy Bacon
Crispy Bacon.description: Crispy Bacon is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Crispy Potato.name: Crispy Potato
Crispy Potato.description: Crispy Potato is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Crocodile Skin Saddle.name: Crocodile Skin Saddle
Crocodile Skin Saddle.description: The Crocodile Skin Saddle is a saddle for mounts that has an crocodile theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Crocodile Trophy.name: Crocodile Trophy
Crocodile Trophy.description: Crocodile Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Crunchy Soy Bean.name: Crunchy Soy Bean
Crunchy Soy Bean.description: Crunchy Soy Bean is a consumable food that boosts maximum health and health regeneration.

Crystallized Miasma.name: Crystallized Miasma
Crystallized Miasma.description: Crystallized Miasma is a resource required to make Distilled Miasmic Coating , a precursor resource used in making Miasmic Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition. Crystallized Miasma is collected from Fauna located in Swamps across Icarus - a map of Prometheus regions can be found here ).

Culinex Backpack.name: Culinex Backpack
Culinex Backpack.description: The Culinex Backpack provides six inventory slots, reduces consumption of food and water, adds +25% to the effectiveness of cooked food modifiers and increases the duration of cooked food modifiers by +25% for items cooked with the backpack equipped.

Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze
Deep Freeze.description: The Deep Freeze is a high-tier item and completely stops the spoil timer for items stored inside. It requires 2,500 units of Power to keep temperatures below freezing, so a strong power source and consistent stream of electricity are critical.

Deer Rug.name: Deer Rug
Deer Rug.description: Deer Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Deer Rug.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Deer Trophy.name: Deer Trophy
Deer Trophy.description: Deer Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Defensive Combat Inhaler.name: Defensive Combat Inhaler
Defensive Combat Inhaler.description: The Defensive Combat Inhaler is a melee combat-focused Medicine that boosts maximum health and returns 40% of physical damage back to the attacker.

Dehumidifier.name: Dehumidifier
Dehumidifier.description: The Dehumidifier allows for cave exploration without the risk of catching Cave Sickness within its effective range. Unlike the Electric Dehumidifier , the Dehumidifier does not prevent Caveworms from spawning.

Desert Animal Feed.name: Desert Animal Feed
Desert Animal Feed.description: Desert Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Desert Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Desert Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Desert Tracker Saddle.name: Desert Tracker Saddle
Desert Tracker Saddle.description: The Desert Tracker Saddle is a saddle for mounts that has desert theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Detoxifier Module.name: Detoxifier Module
Detoxifier Module.description: This module increases poison resistance by 50% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot, reducing the amount of damage received when poisoned. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Detoxifier Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The resistance increase from each Detoxifier Module will stack and will grant near immunity to poison if four are equipped.

Directional Worklamp.name: Directional Worklamp
Directional Worklamp.description: The Directional Worklamp provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units of power to function.

Dirt.name: Dirt
Dirt.description: Dirt is a Resource found on the surface of Icarus in Forest , Grassland , and Swamp biomes. Dirt is collected with a Shovel and can be used to make a variety of items.

Dirt Mounds.name: Dirt Mounds
Dirt Mounds.description: A Shovel can be used on grass/dirt/mud to create a dirt mound by right-clicking. Dirt mounds can also be made in bulk by using a Seeding Cart .

Distilled Miasmic Coating.name: Distilled Miasmic Coating
Distilled Miasmic Coating.description: Distilled Miasmic Coating is a refined resource primarily used to craft a variety of Miasmic Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition that can give Prospectors an edge while on the surface of Icarus.

Dogtags Lure.name: Dogtags Lure
Dogtags Lure.description: The Dogtags Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Dogtags Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

DoseUp Module.name: DoseUp Module
DoseUp Module.description: This module reduces oxygen, food, and water consumption by 15% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Dose Up Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further reduce the consumption of oxygen, food, and water.

Drac Trophy.name: Drac Trophy
Drac Trophy.description: Drac Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Dreadwing Trophy.name: Dreadwing Trophy
Dreadwing Trophy.description: Dreadwing Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Dried Avocado.name: Dried Avocado
Dried Avocado.description: Dried Avocado is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Freshwater Fillet.name: Dried Freshwater Fillet
Dried Freshwater Fillet.description: Dried Freshwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Giant Steak.name: Dried Giant Steak
Dried Giant Steak.description: Dried Giant Steak is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Kiwifruit Chips.name: Dried Kiwifruit Chips
Dried Kiwifruit Chips.description: Dried Kiwifruit Chips is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Rhubarb.name: Dried Rhubarb
Dried Rhubarb.description: Dried Rhubarb is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Saltwater Fillet.name: Dried Saltwater Fillet
Dried Saltwater Fillet.description: Dried Saltwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Dried Tomato.name: Dried Tomato
Dried Tomato.description: Dried Tomato is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Drying Rack.name: Drying Rack
Drying Rack.description: The Drying Rack is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way for Prospectors to preserve foods, while also giving the Prospector a variety of unique status effects from various dried foods. The Drying Rack can also be used to create Cured Leather .

Economic Attachment.name: Economic Attachment
Economic Attachment.description: Economic Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Electricity Tool.name: Electricity Tool
Electricity Tool.description: The Electricity Tool connects Power Sources to Deployables / Power Storage to provide Electricity .

Electric Chimney Cap.name: Electric Chimney Cap
Electric Chimney Cap.description: A Electric Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on an Electric Chimney Extension or directly on an Electric Fireplace .

Electric Chimney Extension.name: Electric Chimney Extension
Electric Chimney Extension.description: A Electric Chimney Extension is a wide flat section of metal chimney or stove pipe to place on a Electric Fireplace or another existing Electric Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with a Electric Chimney Cap .

Electric Composter.name: Electric Composter
Electric Composter.description: The Electric Composter enables the Prospector to produce Biofuel at an accelerated rate compared to the Biofuel Composter . An active power connection providing at least 1500 units is required to operate the Electric Composter. Similar to the Biofuel Composter , an active Water source increases processing speed and is not required.

Electric Dehumidifier.name: Electric Dehumidifier
