Electric Dehumidifier.description: The Electric Dehumidifier allows for cave exploration without the risk of catching Cave Sickness while also preventing cave worms from spawning within its effective range. Will not prevent creatures from spawning when activating Thumpers , Radars, or other mission items that have been placed or activated.

Electric Extractor.name: Electric Extractor
Electric Extractor.description: The Electric Extractor is used to extract Exotics from Exotic Deposits. A connection providing at least 1,500 units of power is required.

Electric Fireplace.name: Electric Fireplace
Electric Fireplace.description: The Electric Fireplace is Tier 4  version of the Fireplace that is powered by Electricity to provide a source of heat, a source of light , Coziness and a means to cook Food indoors. At least 250 units of electricity are required to power the fireplace.

Electric Stove.name: Electric Stove
Electric Stove.description: The Electric Stove is a late-game technology that provides a more robust cooking experience and expands the recipes available compared to the Biofuel Stove . It requires 1,000 units of Power to function and must be snapped to a side of a Marble Kitchen Bench or Kitchen Bench .

Electric Water Pump.name: Electric Water Pump
Electric Water Pump.description: The Electric Water Pump provides Water when supplied with electricity, use the Water Pipe Tool to connect it to Crafting Benches / Water Storage to provide water. Requires 1,000 units of Electricity to function and outputs 1,000 units of Water .

Electric Water Purifier.name: Electric Water Purifier
Electric Water Purifier.description: Electric Water Purifiers can be crafted from the Fabricator with the following resources once the appropriate blueprint point has been spent:

Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer.name: Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer
Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer.description: The Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer produces oxygen from water, removing the need for Oxite . Requires 1,550 Watts and 500 Liters per second to function. The Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer can hold up to 10 Oxygen Containers and will auto fill tanks in seconds.

Electronics.name: Electronics
Electronics.description: Electronics are used in a variety of high-end buildings and components.

Elephant Trophy.name: Elephant Trophy
Elephant Trophy.description: Elephant Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Encrypted Satellite Upgrade.name: Encrypted Satellite Upgrade
Encrypted Satellite Upgrade.description: The Encrypted Satellite Upgrade grants Prospectors access to Operations locked behind encrypted signals. Note: an Infrasonic Relay Upgrade must also be slotted into a CONT4CT Device to access encrypted signals.

Endurance Animal Feed.name: Endurance Animal Feed
Endurance Animal Feed.description: Endurance Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Endurance Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Endurance Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Endurogel.name: Endurogel
Endurogel.description: Endurogel is a Consumable that restores a portion of stamina when consumed. It is a one time use consumable.

Energy Bar.name: Energy Bar
Energy Bar.description: Energy Bar is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. It provides buffs good for being on the go.

Enzyme Geysers.name: Enzyme Geysers
Enzyme Geysers.description: Enzyme Geysers are natural formations found across several biomes in Icarus. These geysers are important resource nodes that offer valuable materials depending on the equipment used.

Epoxy.name: Epoxy
Epoxy.description: Epoxy is used extensively in crafting a variety of items deep into the end-game. Prospectors will find themselves stocking up on epoxy very often.

Equix Trophy.name: Equix Trophy
Equix Trophy.description: Equix Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Farmers Satchel.name: Farmers Satchel
Farmers Satchel.description: Farmers Satchel is a leather satchel that is a Tier 2  upgrade for the Seed Pouch , has 24 inventory slots and holds both Fertilizer and Seeds .
Farmers Satchel.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Filtered Water Trough.name: Filtered Water Trough
Filtered Water Trough.description: The Filtered Water Trough is an expensive variant of the Large Water Trough that is used to keep Mounts and Pets hydrated. Currently does not apply a modifier to animals that drink from it, making it an expensive upgrade to it's lower tier counterparts. Must be connected to Electricity and Water providing at least 1,000 Watts and 30 liters per second to function.

Firepit.name: Firepit
Firepit.description: The Firepit is an upgrade to the Campfire , providing significantly more heat, increased inventory size, and is marginally faster at processing. Due to the increased weight of the Firepit, it should only be deployed in structures that provide adequate support.

Fireplace.name: Fireplace
Fireplace.description: The Fireplace is deployable stone and wood building piece that provides a source of heat, a source of light, Coziness and a safer alternative to cooking Food than the Campfire . It provides an indoor source of heat that allows the prospector to avoid inadvertently setting themselves ablaze.

Fire Extinguisher.name: Fire Extinguisher
Fire Extinguisher.description: The Fire Extinguisher is a Tier 3  tool used to hastily put out fires. As Prospectors use the Fire Extinguisher, its durability decreases and cannot be repaired at the Machining Bench when broken.

Fire Whacker.name: Fire Whacker
Fire Whacker.description: The Fire Whacker is used to put out brush fires on the ground, other players who are on fire, or structures that are ablaze from lightning strikes. The Fire Whacker can also be used to put yourself out - aim down at your feet and start whacking; cannot be in/on source of fire while attempting to use the fire whacker on yourself.

F.I.S.H..name: F.I.S.H.
F.I.S.H..description: When held, the F.I.S.H. will scan the area and indicate which fish can be caught in the area with the base percent chance of catching each. As the Prospector catches each type, the icons for each will appear on the display.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.description: The Flamethrower is a biofuel-powered weapon that sprays a jet of flame that sets fire to any creatures or flammable materials such as trees, shrubs or Wood Building Pieces .

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: The Flashlight is a late-game Light Source , capable of illuminating an entire cave. Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar.

Flexible Frame Attachment.name: Flexible Frame Attachment
Flexible Frame Attachment.description: Flexible Frame Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Flour.name: Flour
Flour.description: Flour is prepared from ground Wheat and is the primary precursor for Flatbread Dough , Bread Dough and Pastry .

Flow Meter.name: Flow Meter
Flow Meter.description: Power/water networks can be connected to a Flow Meter, where it will display how much power/water is being produced, consumed, and stored. Only one network can be shown at a time - press 'F' to toggle between power and water networks. Deployables can be toggled on/off remotely via the Flow Meter.

Foundry.name: Foundry
Foundry.description: The Foundry is the Tier 4  variant of the Anvil Bench that will allow the Prospector to craft the highest quality tools/weapons available on planet, such as the Titanium Pickaxe , Compound Bow , etc. The Foundry is also capable of crafting Tier 2  / Tier 3  tools and weapons, removing the need for a Anvil Bench and Forge .

Freshwater Fillet Curry.name: Freshwater Fillet Curry
Freshwater Fillet Curry.description: Freshwater Fillet Curry is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fried Chicken.name: Fried Chicken
Fried Chicken.description: Fried Chicken is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Fried Eggs.name: Fried Eggs
Fried Eggs.description: Fried Eggs is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fried Tomato.name: Fried Tomato
Fried Tomato.description: Fried Tomato is a consumable food that boosts stamina and health regeneration. As Tomatoes are only found on Prometheus , this recipe requires the New Frontiers DLC to obtain the ingredients.

Frontier Revolver.name: Frontier Revolver
Frontier Revolver.description: The Frontier Revolver is a Legendary Weapon that can be purchased at the Bio-lab .

Fruit Muffin.name: Fruit Muffin
Fruit Muffin.description: Fruit Muffin is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fruit Pie.name: Fruit Pie
Fruit Pie.description: Fruit Pie is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fruit Salad.name: Fruit Salad
Fruit Salad.description: Fruit Salad is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Fruit Smoothie.name: Fruit Smoothie
Fruit Smoothie.description: Fruit Smoothie is a refreshing Drink that when consumed provides a boost to experience gained and resistance to cave sickness.

Fruit Snack Pack.name: Fruit Snack Pack
Fruit Snack Pack.description: Fruit Snack Pack is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Full Sandworm Brazier.name: Full Sandworm Brazier
Full Sandworm Brazier.description: The Full Sandworm Brazier is a large deployable and decorative source of Heat and Light made from the remains of a Sandworm .

Full Sandworm Trophy.name: Full Sandworm Trophy
Full Sandworm Trophy.description: The Full Sandworm Trophy is a large decorative deployable that can be placed on the ground to display the remains of a once mighty Sandworm .

Gatherer's Backpack.name: Gatherer's Backpack
Gatherer's Backpack.description: The Gatherer's Backpack is a must need when mining ores, or felling trees!

Glaci Trophy.name: Glaci Trophy
Glaci Trophy.description: Glaci Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Glass.name: Glass
Glass.description: Glass is a crafted resource refined from Silica Ore or Sand .

Glass Bottle.name: Glass Bottle
Glass Bottle.description: The Glass Bottle is a resource used to make Beer , Wine , and Honey Mead .

Glass Jar.name: Glass Jar
Glass Jar.description: The Glass Jar is a resource used to make Foods like Strawberry Jam , Pickled Carrot , etc.

Glass Milk Bottle.name: Glass Milk Bottle
Glass Milk Bottle.description: Glass Milk Bottle is a container for liquid Milk . It holds 2 litres of Milk and prevents it from spoiling.

Go.name: Go
Go.description: Go is a Consumable with a unique Status Effect : 'All Go'. Can be consumed to satisfy Thirst . It is a one time use emergency beverage to quench thirst.

Gold Attachment.name: Gold Attachment
Gold Attachment.description: Gold Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Gold Cluster Lamp.name: Gold Cluster Lamp
Gold Cluster Lamp.description: The Gold Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Gold Cluster Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Gold Geode Lamp.name: Gold Geode Lamp
Gold Geode Lamp.description: The Gold Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Gold Geode Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Gold Monolith Lamp.name: Gold Monolith Lamp
Gold Monolith Lamp.description: The Gold Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Gold Wire.name: Gold Wire
Gold Wire.description: Gold Wire is used in a variety of high-end buildings and components and is crafted in batches of 5.

Gorse Farming Packet.name: Gorse Farming Packet
Gorse Farming Packet.description: The Gorse Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Gorse seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Gorse Flower Lure.name: Gorse Flower Lure
Gorse Flower Lure.description: The Gorse Flower Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Gorse Flower Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Gorse Tea.name: Gorse Tea
Gorse Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filled Liquid Container such as a Thermos and Gorse Flower .

Grilled Freshwater Fillet.name: Grilled Freshwater Fillet
Grilled Freshwater Fillet.description: Grilled Freshwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Grilled Pumpkin.name: Grilled Pumpkin
Grilled Pumpkin.description: Grilled Pumpkin is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Grilled Saltwater Fillet.name: Grilled Saltwater Fillet
Grilled Saltwater Fillet.description: Grilled Saltwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Growth Fertilizer.name: Growth Fertilizer
Growth Fertilizer.description: Growth Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the growth speed of grown crops. When applied, Crop Growth Speed is increased by 50% and Crop Yield is decreased by 25% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

Guano.name: Guano
Guano.description: Guano is a resource found within the nests of Arctic Vespers , these bat-like creatures inhabit the arctic regions of the game. Players can harvest Guano from their nests once destroyed, providing a valuable material for crafting.

Handcannon Attachment.name: Handcannon Attachment
Handcannon Attachment.description: Handcannon Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Healing Boost Module.name: Healing Boost Module
Healing Boost Module.description: When equipped in a module slot of an Envirosuit , this module decreases the duration of negative afflictions received by other Prospectors near the user, however it does not affect the wearer. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop .

Health Recovery Elixir.name: Health Recovery Elixir
Health Recovery Elixir.description: Health Recovery Elixir is a craftable Medicine that immediately boosts your health by 500 points when consumed.

Hearty Salad.name: Hearty Salad
Hearty Salad.description: Hearty Salad is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Heat Survival Inhaler.name: Heat Survival Inhaler
Heat Survival Inhaler.description: The Heat Survival Inhaler is a Medicine that boosts resistance to heat, damage from fire and the Hyperthermia Status Effect .

Heavy Air Conditioner.name: Heavy Air Conditioner
Heavy Air Conditioner.description: The Heavy Air Conditioner provides Climate Control inside of a building, making it a great addition to any outpost located in a Desert . A connection providing at least 250 electricity is required to use the Heavy Air Conditioner.

Heavy Flamethrower.name: Heavy Flamethrower
Heavy Flamethrower.description: The Heavy Flamethrower is a heavy duty Biofuel -powered flamethrower Legendary Weapon . It can be purchased at the Bio-lab .

Heavy Heater.name: Heavy Heater
Heavy Heater.description: The Heavy Heater provides Climate Control inside of a building, making it a great addition to any outpost located in a Arctic . A connection providing at least 250 units of Power is required to use the Heavy Heater.

High-Quality Fertilizer.name: High-Quality Fertilizer
High-Quality Fertilizer.description: High-Quality Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the yield of grown crops. When applied, Crop Yield is increased by 50% and Crop Growth Speed is slowed by 25% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

Hitching Post.name: Hitching Post
Hitching Post.description: The Hitching Post is a deployable item that can be deployed and used to hitch up tamed Mounts using a Hitching Rope .

Honey.name: Honey
Honey.description: Honey produced from Honeycomb with the Mortar and Pestle or the Beehive Extractor . The Mortar and Pestle produces 1x Honey per 2x Honeycomb and the Beehive Extractor produces 1x Honey for 1x Honeycomb.

Honeycomb.name: Honeycomb
Honeycomb.description: Honeycomb can be found in wild beehives and cave beehives, the hives need to be destroyed with a ballistic or melee weapon. Honeycomb can also be produced in a domestic Beehive .

Honeycomb Bar.name: Honeycomb Bar
Honeycomb Bar.description: A sweet and tasty snack for your travels, long lasting effects and easily crafted.

Honey Glazed Pastry.name: Honey Glazed Pastry
Honey Glazed Pastry.description: Honey Glazed Pastry is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Honey Mead.name: Honey Mead
Honey Mead.description: Honey Mead is a mid-game beverage made from Honey, Red Berry and Yeast that greatly increases stamina and stamina regeneration.
Honey Mead.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

Honey Smoked Bacon.name: Honey Smoked Bacon
Honey Smoked Bacon.description: Honey Smoked Bacon is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Honey Tea.name: Honey Tea
Honey Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filled Liquid Container such as a Thermos and Honey .

Hot Cocoa.name: Hot Cocoa
Hot Cocoa.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filled Liquid Container such as a Thermos and Cocoa Seeds .

Hot Coffee.name: Hot Coffee
Hot Coffee.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filled Liquid Container such as a Thermos and Coffee Beans .

Hot Coffee with Cream.name: Hot Coffee with Cream
Hot Coffee with Cream.description: Hot Coffee with Cream is a late-game hot beverage similar to Hot Coffee , but with increased maximum stamina, increased stamina regeneration and a shorter buff duration of 5 minutes.

Hot Tea.name: Hot Tea
Hot Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filled Liquid Container such as a Thermos and Tea .

Hunting.name: Hunting
Hunting.description: Hunting is an important task for most Icarus prospectors. It provides a source of Food Items , but also a number of Resources essential to survival.

Husk: Extermination.name: Husk: Extermination
Husk: Extermination.description: EXTERMINATE AND RESEARCH THE NATIVE SCORPION

Hyena Bait.name: Hyena Bait
Hyena Bait.description: Hyena Bait is a single-use Crafted Resource used to attract and capture Wild Hyenas when used with a Snare Trap . Hyena Bait does not decay and can only be used in Desert and Volcanic Biomes. Stacks up to ten.

Hyena Rug.name: Hyena Rug
Hyena Rug.description: Hyena Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Hyena Rug.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Hyena Trophy.name: Hyena Trophy
Hyena Trophy.description: Hyena Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Ice.name: Ice
Ice.description: Like stone, prospectors can harvest individual pieces by hand while in the Arctic . However, it is much more efficient to gather Ice from snowpack with a Shovel . Deep Freezers can also be used to generate Ice.

Ice Box.name: Ice Box
Ice Box.description: The Ice Box will slow the decay of food placed inside, increasing the time until food spoils by 6x when filled with Ice . Items in Ice Box reduce their spoil rate by 500% and the container has 12 inventory slots.

IC-001 Extractor.name: IC-001 Extractor
IC-001 Extractor.description: This device is used to extract Exotics from Exotic Deposits. It requires the IC-001 Prototype Power Source to operate and can extract approximately 330 exotics per power source. The speed of the IC-001 Extractor is the same as the Electric Extractor . Due to a bug, the IC-001 Extractor will operate at the same speed as the Biofuel Extractor .

IC-001 Prototype Power Source.name: IC-001 Prototype Power Source
IC-001 Prototype Power Source.description: The IC-001 Prototype Power Source is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station . It is used to power the IC-001 Extractor . It can be used to extract 330 exotics before depleting and has a stack size of one.

Ignari Trophy.name: Ignari Trophy
Ignari Trophy.description: Ignari Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Inaris \"Reaper\" Sickle.name: Inaris "Reaper" Sickle
Inaris \"Reaper\" Sickle.description: The Inaris "Reaper" Sickle is a Seed and plant harvesting Sickle that can be unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect.

Industrial 2-Seater Couch.name: Industrial 2-Seater Couch
Industrial 2-Seater Couch.description: A minimalist Industrial 2-Seater Couch with metal arms that seats two people.

Industrial Bookshelf.name: Industrial Bookshelf
Industrial Bookshelf.description: The Industrial Bookshelf is made from metal, does not have item slots and is part of the industrialist range of furniture.

Industrial Display Cabinet.name: Industrial Display Cabinet
Industrial Display Cabinet.description: A minimalist Industrial Display Cabinet with 25 item slots

Industrial Dresser.name: Industrial Dresser
Industrial Dresser.description: A minimalist Industrial Dresser with 10 item slots.

Industrial Wardrobe.name: Industrial Wardrobe
Industrial Wardrobe.description: A minimalist Industrial Wardrobe with 10 item slots

Inert Volatile Substance.name: Inert Volatile Substance
Inert Volatile Substance.description: Inert Volatile Substance is the byproduct of Volatile Substance . With it no longer in its potent form, it is best thrown away/destroyed (destroying grants 1 Salt ).

Infected Bark.name: Infected Bark
Infected Bark.description: A piece of Wood warped beyond recognition that can be taken to an Organic Residue Cleanser or Biofuel Bio-Cleaner to be turned into five Epoxy per bark.

Infrasonic Relay Upgrade.name: Infrasonic Relay Upgrade
Infrasonic Relay Upgrade.description: The Infrasonic Relay Upgrade grants Prospectors access to Operations locked behind encoded signals. Operations are a variation of traditional Missions that are started in Open Worlds . Upon completing an Operation, Prospectors will be granted Ren ( ) and Exotics / Volatile Exotics for their efforts (rewards vary per Operation and is affected by Open World difficulty). To access Encrypted Signals , Prospectors will need to craft an Encrypted Satellite Upgrade .

International Flag.name: International Flag
International Flag.description: The International Flag is a deployable flag pole for decorating a base and supplying a small boost to Coziness .

Ion Backpack.name: Ion Backpack
Ion Backpack.description: This backpack is specifically designed to benefit players moving into Electronics in Tier 3  and Tier 4  , with notable increases in copper, gold, and platinum yields when mining.

Jaguar Rug.name: Jaguar Rug
Jaguar Rug.description: Jaguar Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Jaguar Rug.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Jaguar Trophy.name: Jaguar Trophy
Jaguar Trophy.description: Jaguar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Jarred Honey.name: Jarred Honey
Jarred Honey.description: Jarred Honey is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Javelin Launcher.name: Javelin Launcher
Javelin Launcher.description: The Javelin Launcher is a Legendary Weapon that is a large Crossbow that fires Javelins for ammunition instead of Bolts . It can be purchased at the Bio-lab .

Kea Trophy.name: Kea Trophy
Kea Trophy.description: Kea Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

KickFall Module.name: KickFall Module
KickFall Module.description: This module increases resistance to fall damage by 40% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot, reducing the amount of damage received when falling. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Kick Fall Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The resistance increase from each Kick Fall Module will stack and will grant near immunity to fall damage if four are equipped. Falling resistance now caps at 99%.

Kiwifruit.name: Kiwifruit
Kiwifruit.description: Kiwifruit are a fresh fruit that can be eaten raw for a small boost in stamina and resistance to cave sickness or used in additional Food recipes.

Kiwifruit Jam.name: Kiwifruit Jam
Kiwifruit Jam.description: Kiwifruit Jam is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Kiwifruit Sorbet.name: Kiwifruit Sorbet
Kiwifruit Sorbet.description: Kiwifruit Sorbet is late-game Food that when consumed provides a boost to stamina, experience gained and resistance to cave sickness.

Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet.name: Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet
Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet.description: The Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Kiwifruit seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop Plots to grow Kiwifruit .

Komodo Trophy.name: Komodo Trophy
Komodo Trophy.description: Komodo Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Kumara.name: Kumara
Kumara.description: Kumara is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Kumara Farming Packet.name: Kumara Farming Packet
Kumara Farming Packet.description: The Kumara Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Kumara seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Large Advanced Aquarium.name: Large Advanced Aquarium
Large Advanced Aquarium.description: The Large Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Large Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units of Power and a water network providing at least 750 units of Water . The Large Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Large Advanced Aquarium can store 12 fish.

Large Beehive Expansion.name: Large Beehive Expansion
Large Beehive Expansion.description: A Beekeeping expansion to the small Beehive to increase inventory slots by 6. Requires the Small Beehive Expansion to be installed first. Added through the Beehive GUI

Large Water Trough.name: Large Water Trough
Large Water Trough.description: The Large Water Trough is an upgrade to the Water Trough that allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected to Water using a Water Pipe Tool . The Large Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network like Water Barrels or Metal Rain Reservoirs .

Larkwell Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Bolt Bundle will add 25x Larkwell Martinez Bolt s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle will add 25x Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle will add 25x Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Martinez Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Due to the one-time use payload, these bolts cannot be recovered once fired.

Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Due to the one-time use payload, these bolts cannot be recovered once fired.

Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen.name: Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen
Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including a Rain Reservoir , the Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen is water tight and will not leak. The Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen remains filled between Prospects with the added ability to raise the Prospectors core temperature when consumed, making it a useful upgrade to the Shengong 'Hulu' Canteen .

Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack.name: Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack
Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack.description: The Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack is a must need for the scatter gun fan.

Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank.name: Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank
Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank.description: It is worth noting that this Oxygen Container takes 65 Oxite to fill at a Oxite Dissolver and will last just as long as a Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank , but comes with the bonus of increased health regeneration and exposure resistance. Will remain filled between Prospects.

Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

Larkwell Martinez Sickle.name: Larkwell Martinez Sickle
Larkwell Martinez Sickle.description: When using a Sickle, the Prospector will gain a significant increase in a given Plant Resource , when compared to picking that resource by hand.

Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack.name: Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack
Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack.description: The Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack is a massive boost to suit inventory.

Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle will add 25x Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt s to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Lava Broodling Trophy.name: Lava Broodling Trophy
Lava Broodling Trophy.description: Lava Broodling Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Lava Survival Inhaler.name: Lava Survival Inhaler
Lava Survival Inhaler.description: The Lava Survival Inhaler is a Medicine that boosts resistance to fire, increases health regeneration and exposure resistance while in a volcanic region. It also reduces water consumption.

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.description: The Lightning Rod is used to redirect lightning strikes from hitting buildings.

Lightweight Frame Attachment.name: Lightweight Frame Attachment
Lightweight Frame Attachment.description: Lightweight Frame Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Light Automatic Carbine.name: Light Automatic Carbine
Light Automatic Carbine.description: The Light Automatic Carbine is a semi-automatic rifle the fires pistol Ammunition such as Armor Piercing , Explosive , Incendiary , Obsidian or regular Pistol Rounds .

Lily Farming Packet.name: Lily Farming Packet
Lily Farming Packet.description: The Lily Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Lily seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Localized Terraforming Device.name: Localized Terraforming Device
Localized Terraforming Device.description: The Localized Terraforming Device is a Deployable device used to restore trees to the Icarus landscape. It is powered by Electricity and charged up for use with Condensed Enzymes or Synthetic Enzymes . Once charged, the device is triggered and creates a localized storm cloud around the device that once cleared, reveals newly restored trees.

Lowburn Module.name: Lowburn Module
Lowburn Module.description: This module increases fire resistance by 50% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot, reducing the amount of damage received when on fire. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Lowburn Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The resistance increase from each Lowburn Module will stack and will grant near immunity to fire if four are equipped.

Luxury Chicken Coop.name: Luxury Chicken Coop
Luxury Chicken Coop.description: The Luxury Chicken Coop is a luxury red deployable building that houses Chickens and provides a place for them to lay Eggs . When chickens are within proximity to the coop, their eggs will appear in the coop's inventory instead of being laid on the ground.

Mass Dampener Module.name: Mass Dampener Module
Mass Dampener Module.description: This module increases movement speed by 10% when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Mass Dampeners may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The speed increase from each Mass Dampener Module will stack and will further increase movement speed.

Material Processor.name: Material Processor
Material Processor.description: The Material Processor serves as a much faster and more advanced Tier 4  version of the Mortar and Pestle that uses electricity to craft items.

Medical Satchel.name: Medical Satchel
Medical Satchel.description: The Medical Satchel is a 12 slot satchel dedicated to storing medical supplies such as Bandages , Splints and other Medicine . The satchel takes up one inventory or hotbar slot.

Melee Damage Attachment.name: Melee Damage Attachment
Melee Damage Attachment.description: Melee Damage Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Melon Smoked Giant Steak.name: Melon Smoked Giant Steak
Melon Smoked Giant Steak.description: Melon Smoked Giant Steak is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Metal Rain Reservoir.name: Metal Rain Reservoir
Metal Rain Reservoir.description: Fill rate is defined by the total excess water available, the flow rate for the water storage unit, and the number of storage units connected to the network. If there are multiple water storage units connected to a single network, the total excess is divided amongst them all - if they are able to be filled. Ex: if a network is producing 2,500 excess water and there are 2 Metal Rain Reservoirs that can be filled, the fill rate for each will be 1,000.

Metal Water Trough.name: Metal Water Trough
Metal Water Trough.description: The Metal Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Water Trough that allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected to Water using a Water Pipe Tool , similar to the Large Water Trough . The Metal Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network like Water Barrels or Metal Rain Reservoirs .

MicroMeal.name: MicroMeal
MicroMeal.description: Micro Meal is a Food with a unique Status Effect : 'Emergency Rations'. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger . It is a one time use emergency ration to stave off starvation.

Migrating Sands.name: Migrating Sands
Migrating Sands.description: INVESTIGATE AN ANOMALY IN THE DESERT

Milk Pail.name: Milk Pail
Milk Pail.description: Milk Pail is a container for liquid Milk . It holds 5 litres of Milk and unlike the Glass Milk Bottle , the Milk will spoil over time. Once the Milk has spoiled, the Milk Pail will empty and be available for reuse.

Moa Trophy.name: Moa Trophy
Moa Trophy.description: Moa Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Mortar and Pestle.name: Mortar and Pestle
Mortar and Pestle.description: The Mortar and Pestle is an early-game crafting station that allows prospectors to craft several useful Resources and precursor materials, including but not limited to: Steel Bloom , Epoxy , Tree Sap , Carbon Paste , Organic Resin , and Gunpowder .

Mountaineering Animal Feed.name: Mountaineering Animal Feed
Mountaineering Animal Feed.description: Mountaineering Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Mountaineering Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Mountaineering Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Mushroom Farming Packet.name: Mushroom Farming Packet
Mushroom Farming Packet.description: The Mushroom Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Mushroom seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Mushroom Omelette.name: Mushroom Omelette
Mushroom Omelette.description: Mushroom Omelette is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

MXC Campfire.name: MXC Campfire
MXC Campfire.description: The MXC Campfire is similar to a Campfire , only elevated to decrease the odds of Prospectors accidentally setting themselves on fire.

MXC Camping Cooker.name: MXC Camping Cooker
MXC Camping Cooker.description: The MXC Camping Cooker is a portable version of the Potbelly Stove that is purchased from the Workshop on the Space Station and powered by Hydrazine . It does not require shelter to operate.

MXC Camping Heater.name: MXC Camping Heater
MXC Camping Heater.description: The MXC Camping Heater is a portable heat source for use in cold regions such as the Arctic that can be purchased from the Workshop on the Space Station.

MXC Cot.name: MXC Cot
MXC Cot.description: The MXC Cot is a portable ready-made Bed that can be purchased from the Workshop or brought down to the planet using Orbital Exchange Interface .

MXC Crate.name: MXC Crate
MXC Crate.description: The MXC Crate is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect. Similar to the Medium Iron Crate , the MXC Crate does not require shelter. Has 25 slots.

MXC Firewhacker.name: MXC Firewhacker
MXC Firewhacker.description: The MXC Firewhacker is the Workshop equivalent of a Fire Whacker with increased durability and reduced stamina consumption when used.

MXC Fuel Canister.name: MXC Fuel Canister
MXC Fuel Canister.description: The MXC Fuel Canister is purchased from the Workshop on the Space Station and is used for Biofuel storage. It comes prefilled with fuel when purchased and can be refilled at the Biofuel Composter , Electric Composter or by interacting with a Portable Biofuel Tank deployed on the ground. It can be taken back to Orbit and will remain filled, allowing the Prospector to use it across multiple prospects. It does not fill when returned to station. It holds 10 liters of Biofuel.

MXC Hydrazine Canister.name: MXC Hydrazine Canister
MXC Hydrazine Canister.description: The MXC Hydrazine Canister is purchased from the Workshop on the Space Station and stores 10,000 litres of hydrazine. The fuel is used in several other MXC devices by placing the canister in the device's inventory slot. The fuel canister cannot be refilled.

MXC Sickle.name: MXC Sickle
MXC Sickle.description: When using a Sickle, the Prospector will gain a significant increase in a given Plant Resource , when compared to picking that resource by hand.

Natural Rustic Sign.name: Natural Rustic Sign
Natural Rustic Sign.description: A Natural Rustic Sign made of wood.

Needler Trophy.name: Needler Trophy
Needler Trophy.description: Needler Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Noise Suppression Attachment.name: Noise Suppression Attachment
Noise Suppression Attachment.description: Noise Suppression Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Noxious Crust.name: Noxious Crust
Noxious Crust.description: Noxious Crust is a by-product of mining using Miasmic Tools that can be taken to an Organic Residue Cleanser or Biofuel Bio-Cleaner to be turned into various Minerals .

Nutrition Attachment.name: Nutrition Attachment
Nutrition Attachment.description: The Nutrition Attachment is an armor alteration that adds an extra stomach slot for Food and increases the duration of food Status Effects .

Obsidian.name: Obsidian
Obsidian.description: Glass formed from the belly of the earth, as chunks of solid lava. Obsidian is found in the Volcanic Biome in Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using a Sledgehammer .

Obsidian Bolt.name: Obsidian Bolt
Obsidian Bolt.description: The Obsidian Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Obsidian Javelin.name: Obsidian Javelin
Obsidian Javelin.description: The Obsidian Javelin is a variant of the Obsidian Spear that can only be thrown. Deals fire damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire. . When the Burning modifier does proc, periodic fire damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds. Fauna with:

Omnidirectional Worklamp.name: Omnidirectional Worklamp
Omnidirectional Worklamp.description: The Omnidirectional Worklamp provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units of power to function.

Omni Animal Feed.name: Omni Animal Feed
Omni Animal Feed.description: Omni Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Omni Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Omni Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Orbital Exchange Interface.name: Orbital Exchange Interface
Orbital Exchange Interface.description: The Orbital Exchange Interface is required to send Exotics / Stabilized Exotics back to Orbit and to receive payment for them. Volatile Raw Exotics must be cleaned at a Organic Residue Cleanser before they can be sent up. Must be placed outdoors.

Organic Residue Cleanser.name: Organic Residue Cleanser
Organic Residue Cleanser.description: The Organic Residue Cleanser is a Tier 4  deployable cleaning device used to clean and process Volatile Raw Exotics , frozen and infected materials and organic materials collected from world bosess.

Organic Resin.name: Organic Resin
Organic Resin.description: Organic Resin is used in crafting of items such as Electronics , and Composite Paste , making it a critical component in Tier 4  crafting.

Ornate Water Trough.name: Ornate Water Trough
Ornate Water Trough.description: The Ornate Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Water Trough that allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected to Water using a Water Pipe Tool , similar to the Large Water Trough . The Ornate Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network like Water Barrels or Metal Rain Reservoirs .

Oxidizer.name: Oxidizer
Oxidizer.description: Early game , unlocking this provides for an incredible boost in efficiency vs the initial need to consume raw Oxite to maintain oxygen supply. Once built and placed, the Oxidizer is used by adding Oxite (10 max) and once the leather balloon is filled, oxygen can be consumed by activating the balloon. The balloon holds up to 1.00L (1000u) of breathable oxygen.

Oxite.name: Oxite
Oxite.description: Oxite is an one of the most precious Minerals found on the surface of Icarus. Prospectors require a steady supply of Oxygen to survive, and Oxite is a solidified mix of water and oxygen.

Oxite Cluster Lamp.name: Oxite Cluster Lamp
Oxite Cluster Lamp.description: The Oxite Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Oxite Cluster Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Oxite Dissolver.name: Oxite Dissolver
Oxite Dissolver.description: More efficient than the Oxidizer , this is used in tandem with Oxygen Containers placed into the dissolver. The front slots of the deployable only accept Oxygen Containers and will automatically fill said containers from Oxite placed into the machine when supplied with Sulfur . A stack of sulfur will last sixteen minutes and forty seconds, producing 0.1 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.

Oxite Geode Lamp.name: Oxite Geode Lamp
Oxite Geode Lamp.description: The Oxite Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Oxite Geode Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Oxite Monolith Lamp.name: Oxite Monolith Lamp
Oxite Monolith Lamp.description: The Oxite Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Oxite Monolith Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Oxygel.name: Oxygel
Oxygel.description: Oxygel is a Consumable that provides Oxygen when consumed. It is a one time use emergency ration of Oxygen.

Oxygen.name: Oxygen
Oxygen.description: Oxygen is one of the three survival meters that must be maintained by prospectors while attempting a Prospect on Icarus.

Oxygen Bladder.name: Oxygen Bladder
Oxygen Bladder.description: Oxygen Bladder is filled at the Oxite Dissolver , and is equipped in an Envirosuit oxygen slot enabling automatic Oxygen replenishment. It holds 1000 oxygen units.

Oxygen Tank.name: Oxygen Tank
Oxygen Tank.description: The Oxygen Tank is filled at the Oxite Dissolver and Metal Oxite Dissolver and is equipped in an Envirosuit oxygen slot enabling automatic Oxygen replenishment. It holds 5000 oxygen units, 5 times as much as a Oxygen Bladder ; great for long trips across Icarus.

Paints.name: Paints
Paints.description: Paints are used make several different Paintings that can be hung on various Frames .

Pastry.name: Pastry
Pastry.description: Pastry is a component in making food, such as Crumbed Saltwater Fillet and Meat Pie .

Patcher II Module.name: Patcher II Module
Patcher II Module.description: This module increases the number of available inventory slots by 5 when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Patcher II Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit.

Patcher I Module.name: Patcher I Module
Patcher I Module.description: This module increases the number of available inventory slots by 2 when equipped in an Envirosuit module slot. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Patcher I Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit.

Pavlova.name: Pavlova
Pavlova.description: Pavlova is late-game Food that when consumed provides a considerable boost to health, stamina, speed, resistance to cave sickness and a chance to mine additional stone.

Pheromone Module.name: Pheromone Module
Pheromone Module.description: This module increases the movement speed and maximum stamina of mounts near the user. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Pheromone Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the benefit received from the equipped modules.

Pickled Avocado.name: Pickled Avocado
Pickled Avocado.description: Pickled Avocado is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Pickled Avocado , which increases maximum Stamina , reduces food consumption, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Avocado does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Carrot.name: Pickled Carrot
Pickled Carrot.description: Pickled Carrot is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Pickled Carrot , which improves Projectile Damage and shared experience gain. Pickled Carrot does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Eggs.name: Pickled Eggs
Pickled Eggs.description: Pickled Eggs is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Pickled Eggs , which increases maximum Stamina , increases the amount of Stone found while mining, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Eggs does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Freshwater Fillet.name: Pickled Freshwater Fillet
Pickled Freshwater Fillet.description: Pickled Freshwater Fillet is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Pickled Freshwater Fillet , which increases maximum Health , improves Stamina and Health regeneration, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Freshwater Fillet does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Tomato.name: Pickled Tomato
Pickled Tomato.description: Pickled Tomato is a Food that satisfies Hunger . It provides the unique Status Effect , Pickled Tomato , which increases maximum Stamina , improves Health regeneration, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Tomato does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Plain Jerky.name: Plain Jerky
Plain Jerky.description: Plain Jerky is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Plating Attachment.name: Plating Attachment
Plating Attachment.description: Plating Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Platinum Attachment.name: Platinum Attachment
Platinum Attachment.description: Platinum Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Platinum Bolt.name: Platinum Bolt
Platinum Bolt.description: The Platinum Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Platinum Javelin.name: Platinum Javelin
Platinum Javelin.description: The Platinum Javelin is a variant of the Platinum Spear that can only be thrown; a substantial upgrade to the Tier 2  Javelins.

Platinum Lightning Rod.name: Platinum Lightning Rod
Platinum Lightning Rod.description: The Platinum Lightning Rod absorbs lightning strikes from Weather Events and optionally captures the energy and directs it to a connected Electricity network.

Platinum Sheath.name: Platinum Sheath
Platinum Sheath.description: Platinum Sheath is used in a variety of high-end resources and components and is crafted in batches of 4.

Platinum Shield.name: Platinum Shield
Platinum Shield.description: The Platinum Shield is crafted at the Forge or Foundry with the following resources:

Platinum Shovel.name: Platinum Shovel
Platinum Shovel.description: The Platinum Shovel is an upgrade to the Shovel , offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to create Dirt Mounds (right-click), harvest Ice / Dirt / Sand (left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in the Arctic / Volcanic biomes on Icarus.

Platinum Sickle.name: Platinum Sickle
Platinum Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs, Reed Flower , Wheat , etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

Player Tracker Module.name: Player Tracker Module
Player Tracker Module.description: When this module is equipped in an Envirosuit module slot it allows a prospector to see other prospectors on the map. It can be researched and created on the Space Station in the Workshop .

Pockets Attachment.name: Pockets Attachment
Pockets Attachment.description: Pockets Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Poisoned Animal Bait.name: Poisoned Animal Bait
Poisoned Animal Bait.description: Poisoned Animal Bait is used to lure random predators when left in an open area, poisoning Fauna who choose to consume it. The blueprint is unlocked account-wide after completing the prospect Wet Work: Extermination . Stacks up to 5.

Poison Sack Lure.name: Poison Sack Lure
Poison Sack Lure.description: The Poison Sack Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Poison Sack Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Polar Bear Rug.name: Polar Bear Rug
Polar Bear Rug.description: Polar Bear Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Polar Bear Rug.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Polar Bear Trophy.name: Polar Bear Trophy
Polar Bear Trophy.description: Polar Bear Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Potato and Carrot Fries.name: Potato and Carrot Fries
Potato and Carrot Fries.description: Potato and Carrot Fries is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Potato Farming Packet.name: Potato Farming Packet
Potato Farming Packet.description: The Potato Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Potato seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Potbelly Stove.name: Potbelly Stove
Potbelly Stove.description: The Potbelly Stove is an early- to mid-game cooking bench that provides a more efficient way to cook raw foods than the Campfire . The Potbelly Stove introduces new, multi-ingredient recipes with unique status effects. It is also an exceptional source of heat.

Powered Creature Deterrent.name: Powered Creature Deterrent
Powered Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Powered Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning of Fauna so be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Prometheus.name: Prometheus
Prometheus.description: Prometheus General information Location System: Proxima Centauri Star: Wolf 1061 Gas giant: Minos Moon: Wolf 1061ca / Icarus Difficulty Available by Purchasing New Frontiers Expansion

Pronghorn Trophy.name: Pronghorn Trophy
Pronghorn Trophy.description: Pronghorn Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Prospector Field Guide.name: Prospector Field Guide
Prospector Field Guide.description: The Prospector Field Guide is an in-game tool ( default keybind: J) designed to provide players with comprehensive information on bestiaries, fishing records, and craftable items. This guide will be expanded to include detailed entries for every item, offering valuable insights to improve the crafting experience.

Protection Module.name: Protection Module
Protection Module.description: This module increases the user's resistance to wounds received from aggressive Fauna, specifically the Basic Wound + Deep Wound debuff. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Protection Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will grant near immunity to Basic/Deep wounds if four are equipped.

Pumpkin Farming Packet.name: Pumpkin Farming Packet
Pumpkin Farming Packet.description: The Pumpkin Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Pumpkin seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Pygmy Lop Trophy.name: Pygmy Lop Trophy
Pygmy Lop Trophy.description: Pygmy Lop Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Rabbit Trophy.name: Rabbit Trophy
Rabbit Trophy.description: Rabbit Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Racing Saddle.name: Racing Saddle
Racing Saddle.description: The Racing Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has a racing theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Rain Reservoir.name: Rain Reservoir
Rain Reservoir.description: Rain Reservoirs can be crafted from the Crafting Bench with the following resources once the appropriate blueprint point has been spent:

Ranged Attachment Pack.name: Ranged Attachment Pack
Ranged Attachment Pack.description: Ranged Attachment Pack is a Tier 3  Tech needed for the Alteration Bench that allows Prospectors to alter their ranged weapons with Attachment Packs .

Reaping Attachment.name: Reaping Attachment
Reaping Attachment.description: Reaping Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Recovery Attachment.name: Recovery Attachment
Recovery Attachment.description: The Recovery Attachment is an armor alteration that reduces the duration of the effects of parasites, poison, bacterial afflications and physical trauma.

Redback Trophy.name: Redback Trophy
Redback Trophy.description: Redback Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Reed Farming Packet.name: Reed Farming Packet
Reed Farming Packet.description: The Reed Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Reed seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Reed Flower Lure.name: Reed Flower Lure
Reed Flower Lure.description: The Reed Flower Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Reed Flower Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
Refrigerator.description: The Refrigerator will slow the decay of food placed inside, increasing the time until food spoils by 8x when powered. Requires 500 units of power to function. Has 24 slots.

Regenerative Combat Inhaler.name: Regenerative Combat Inhaler
Regenerative Combat Inhaler.description: The Regenerative Combat Inhaler is a Medicine that boosts health regeneration and resistance to basic and deep wounds.

Repair Speed Attachment.name: Repair Speed Attachment
Repair Speed Attachment.description: Repair Speed Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Rhubarb.name: Rhubarb
Rhubarb.description: Rhubarb is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Rhubarb Farming Packet.name: Rhubarb Farming Packet
Rhubarb Farming Packet.description: The Rhubarb Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Rhubarb seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Ripe Coconut.name: Ripe Coconut
Ripe Coconut.description: If a Prospector lets a Young Coconut decay, it will ripen into a ripe coconut. Let a ripe coconut decay, and it will ripen again into a Mature Coconut .

Roast Chicken.name: Roast Chicken
Roast Chicken.description: Roast Chicken is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Roast Squash.name: Roast Squash
Roast Squash.description: Roast Squash is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Roat Trophy.name: Roat Trophy
Roat Trophy.description: Roat Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Rubberized Attachment.name: Rubberized Attachment
Rubberized Attachment.description: Rubberized Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Rubber Lure.name: Rubber Lure
Rubber Lure.description: The Rubber Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Rubber Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Rustic 2-Seater Couch.name: Rustic 2-Seater Couch
Rustic 2-Seater Couch.description: The Rustic 2-Seater Couch is a rustic item that can seat 2 prospectors.

Rustic 3-Seater Couch.name: Rustic 3-Seater Couch
Rustic 3-Seater Couch.description: The Rustic 3-Seater Couch is a rustic item that can seat 3 prospectors.

Rustic Bookshelf.name: Rustic Bookshelf
Rustic Bookshelf.description: The Rustic Bookshelf allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Cabinet.name: Rustic Cabinet
Rustic Cabinet.description: The Rustic Cabinet allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Candles.name: Rustic Candles
Rustic Candles.description: Four types of Rustic Candles can be deployed by holding the candle and selecting R for the rotary menu. Two recipes create the candles using either Animal Fat or Beeswax . Holding R when viewing the candle will bring up the fuel container which will either be Animal Fat or Beeswax.

Rustic Chicken Coop.name: Rustic Chicken Coop
Rustic Chicken Coop.description: The Rustic Chicken Coop is a deployable building that houses Chickens and provides a place for them to lay Eggs . When chickens are within proximity to the coop, their eggs will appear in the coop's inventory instead of being laid on the ground.

Rustic Dresser.name: Rustic Dresser
Rustic Dresser.description: The Rustic Dresser allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Icarus Statue.name: Rustic Icarus Statue
Rustic Icarus Statue.description: The Rustic Icarus Statue is a decorative statue

Rustic Nightstand.name: Rustic Nightstand
Rustic Nightstand.description: The Rustic Nightstand is available in 5 varieties when holding item selet R for the variations. The Rustic Nightstand allows prospectors to store 5 items.

Rustic Pot.name: Rustic Pot
Rustic Pot.description: The Rustic Pot has two variations that can be selected by holding item and holding R. The item is decorative only and cannot store items

Rustic Stool.name: Rustic Stool
Rustic Stool.description: The Rustic Stool seats one prospector.

Rustic Wardrobe.name: Rustic Wardrobe
Rustic Wardrobe.description: The Rustic Wardrobe is a large wardrobe with 10 item slots

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.description: Salt is a Mineral and can be found in the wilderness in similar areas to Sulfur , Oxite and Silica .

Saltwater Fillet Sashimi.name: Saltwater Fillet Sashimi
Saltwater Fillet Sashimi.description: Saltwater Fillet Sashimi is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Sand.name: Sand
Sand.description: Sand is a Resource found on the surface of Icarus in Desert biomes. Sand is collected with a Shovel and can be used to make Glass in a Concrete Furnace / Electric Furnace .

Sandworm Brazier.name: Sandworm Brazier
Sandworm Brazier.description: The Sandworm Brazier is a deployable and decorative source of Heat and Light made from the remains of a Sandworm .

Sandworm Javelin.name: Sandworm Javelin
Sandworm Javelin.description: The Sandworm Javelin is a variant of the Sandworm Spear that can only be thrown. Considering the Sandworm Javelin deals the same amount of damage as a Bone Javelin , the Sandworm Javelin is overshadowed by higher-tier javelins and is not worth the effort. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to twenty.

Sandworm Scale Saddle.name: Sandworm Scale Saddle
Sandworm Scale Saddle.description: The Sandworm Scale Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has a sandworm theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Sandworm Trophy.name: Sandworm Trophy
Sandworm Trophy.description: The Sandworm Trophy is a decorative deployable that can be placed on a wall to display the head of a once mighty Sandworm .

Sauteed Rhubarb.name: Sauteed Rhubarb
Sauteed Rhubarb.description: Sauteed Rhubarb is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Savory Roll.name: Savory Roll
Savory Roll.description: Savory Roll is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Scoria.name: Scoria
Scoria.description: A rough-textured rock ejected from the planet's surface during volcanic activity. Scoria is found in the Volcanic Biome in Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using a Sledgehammer .

Scoria Brick.name: Scoria Brick
Scoria Brick.description: Scoria Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craft Scoria Brick Building Pieces at an Advanced Masonry Bench / Electric Masonry Bench .
Scoria Brick.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

Scorpion Hedgehog.name: Scorpion Hedgehog
Scorpion Hedgehog.description: Scorpion Hedgehogs are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment. The recipe to craft this defensive trap is only learned after completing the prospect Carapace: Research .

Scorpion Tail Lure.name: Scorpion Tail Lure
Scorpion Tail Lure.description: The Scorpion Tail Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Scorpion Tail Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Scorpion Trophy.name: Scorpion Trophy
Scorpion Trophy.description: Scorpion Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Scrambled Eggs.name: Scrambled Eggs
Scrambled Eggs.description: Scrambled Eggs is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Seared Mushroom.name: Seared Mushroom
Seared Mushroom.description: Seared Mushroom is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Seed Animal Feed.name: Seed Animal Feed
Seed Animal Feed.description: Seed Animal Feed is a Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to a mount to satisfy Hunger . Seed Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Seed Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Seed Cracker.name: Seed Cracker
Seed Cracker.description: A snack made with just seed.

Seed Extractor.name: Seed Extractor
Seed Extractor.description: The Seed Extractor is a small deployable bench used to process fruits and plants to extract Seeds for Farming .

Seed Pouch.name: Seed Pouch
Seed Pouch.description: A leather pouch for seeds that can fit 12 full stacks of Seeds .

Shaggy Zebra Trophy.name: Shaggy Zebra Trophy
Shaggy Zebra Trophy.description: Shaggy Zebra Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Shaped Obsidian.name: Shaped Obsidian
Shaped Obsidian.description: Shaped Obsidian is a refined resource used to craft Organic Residue Cleansers , Obsidian Armor and a variety of Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition.
Shaped Obsidian.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

Shelter.name: Shelter
Shelter.description: Shelter is an essential condition of survival on Icarus, and governs how a prospector can withstand the frequent Storms on Icarus.

Shengong \"Hulu\" Canteen.name: Shengong "Hulu" Canteen
Shengong \"Hulu\" Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including a Rain Reservoir . Similar to the Canteen , the Shengong "Hulu" Canteen is water tight and will not leak. The Shengong "Hulu" Canteen will remain filled between Prospects, making it a valuable Workshop purchase early on.

Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank.name: Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank
Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank.description: It is worth noting that this Oxygen Container takes 65 Oxite to fill at a Oxite Dissolver , and will last significantly longer than an Oxygen Bladder , making it one of the most valuable early game purchases in the Workshop . Will remain filled between Prospects. It holds 6500 oxygen units making it useful for stockpile missions that require oxygen delivery.

Shepherd's Pie.name: Shepherd's Pie
Shepherd's Pie.description: Shepherd's Pie is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Shepherd's Roll.name: Shepherd's Roll
Shepherd's Roll.description: A Shepherd's Roll is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: The Shovel is an upgrade to the Wooden Shovel , offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability.
