Like its predecessor, it can be used to create Dirt Mounds (right-click), harvest Ice / Dirt / Sand (left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in the Arctic / Volcanic biomes on Icarus.

Silencer Attachment.name: Silencer Attachment
Silencer Attachment.description: Silencer Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Simple Creature Deterrent.name: Simple Creature Deterrent
Simple Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Simple Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning of Fauna so be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Small Beehive Expansion.name: Small Beehive Expansion
Small Beehive Expansion.description: The Small Beehive Expansion increases the Small Beehive generic inventory slots by 6 and reduces the energy transmutation cost by 10%.

Small Blue Pouch.name: Small Blue Pouch
Small Blue Pouch.description: The Small Blue Pouch is a blue variant of the Small Pouch , a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.
Small Blue Pouch.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Small Brick Sign.name: Small Brick Sign
Small Brick Sign.description: The Small Brick Sign is a deployable sign post available as a wall sign, floor sign or as two angled variants.
Small Brick Sign.crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench

Small Composite Sign.name: Small Composite Sign
Small Composite Sign.description: The Small Composite Sign is a deployable sign post in a modern style and made from Composites .

Small Green Pouch.description: The Small Green Pouch is a green variant of the Small Pouch , a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.

Smashed Avocado Toast.name: Smashed Avocado Toast
Smashed Avocado Toast.description: Smashed Avocado Toast is a long-lasting Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Smoker.name: Smoker
Smoker.description: The smoker is powered by Charcoal and gives you another way to cook longer lasting food. The smoker needs to be placed outside and gives a heat modifier.

Sniper Scope Attachment.name: Sniper Scope Attachment
Sniper Scope Attachment.description: Sniper Scope Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech. Does not give an actual scope to weapon.

Snow Leopard Rug.name: Snow Leopard Rug
Snow Leopard Rug.description: Snow Leopard Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Solar Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar Panel.description: The Solar Panel generates Electricity when positioned in direct sunlight. Use an Electricity Tool to connect it to Benches to provide power. Contrary to its description, the Solar Panel needs to "see" the sun itself, not just be in a sunlit area to work. The panel will only provide power if it has an unobstructed view of the sun in the sky; anything that casts a shadow on it can interfere with power production. Solar Panel can be placed underwater.

Soy Bean Stir-Fry.name: Soy Bean Stir-Fry
Soy Bean Stir-Fry.description: Soy Bean Stir-Fry is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Splint.name: Splint
Splint.description: Splint is used to speed up the recovery of broken bones.

Spoiled Plants.name: Spoiled Plants
Spoiled Plants.description: Spoiled Plants are the byproduct of spoiled food like vegetables and fruit, and are used to craft Volatile Substance or Basic Fertilizer for Crop Plots. Cannot be eaten despite having the You Gonna Eat That? talent.

Squash Farming Packet.name: Squash Farming Packet
Squash Farming Packet.description: The Squash Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Squash seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Stabilized Exotics.name: Stabilized Exotics
Stabilized Exotics.description: Stabilized Exotics are a form of currency in the Workshop and the stabilized state that results from processing and cleaning Volatile Raw Exotics found on Prometheus .

Stamina.name: Stamina
Stamina.description: Stamina is a power gauge that fuels many of the actions in Icarus. Using tools, sprinting, jumping, attacking, and crafting all require stamina. Status Effects can increase or decrease max stamina or stamina regeneration. A prospector who runs out of stamina becomes exhausted and cannot perform stamina-consuming actions until they've regained a significant portion of their stamina.

Stealth.name: Stealth
Stealth.description: Stealth is concealment from Fauna found on Icarus, and determines how both hostile and passive creatures react to your presence. Hunting is an important task for most Icarus prospectors. It provides a renewable source of Food Items , but also a number of Resources essential to survival.

Storm Visor Attachment.name: Storm Visor Attachment
Storm Visor Attachment.description: Storm Visor Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Strengthened Strings Attachment.name: Strengthened Strings Attachment
Strengthened Strings Attachment.description: Strengthened Strings Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Strength Boost Module.name: Strength Boost Module
Strength Boost Module.description: When equipped in a module slot of an Envirosuit , this module increases the carry weight capacity of Prospectors near the user, however it does not affect the wearers max carry weight. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop .

Stringy Jerky.name: Stringy Jerky
Stringy Jerky.description: Stringy Jerky is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Stryder Trophy.name: Stryder Trophy
Stryder Trophy.description: Stryder Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Stuffed Avocado.name: Stuffed Avocado
Stuffed Avocado.description: Stuffed Avocado is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .
Stuffed Avocado.crafted_at: Flavor TextAnother great meal from your Cooking Station

base_recipe.crafted_at: Flavor TextAnother great meal from your Cooking Station

Sugar Cane.name: Sugar Cane
Sugar Cane.description: Sugar Cane does not naturally spawn on Icarus and is obtainable by planting Seeds obtained from a Sugar Cane Farming Packet ordered from the Workshop through the Orbital Exchange Interface .

Sugar Cane Farming Packet.name: Sugar Cane Farming Packet
Sugar Cane Farming Packet.description: The Sugar Cane Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Sugar Cane Seeds , which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop Plots to grow Plant Resources .

Sugar Cubes.name: Sugar Cubes
Sugar Cubes.description: Sugar Cubes are an intermediate crafting resource produced by processing Sugar Cane in a Mortar and Pestle or a Material Processor

Sulfur.name: Sulfur
Sulfur.description: Sulfur is a Mineral found on the surface of Icarus. Sulfur is used as a fuel source to fill Oxygen Containers and it is used in crafting items like Gunpowder and the Fire Extinguisher .

Super Cooled Ice.name: Super Cooled Ice
Super Cooled Ice.description: Super Cooled Ice is a resource required to make Cold Steel Ingots , a precursor resource used in making Cold Steel Tools , Weapons , and Ammo .

Supplemental Filtration Attachment.name: Supplemental Filtration Attachment
Supplemental Filtration Attachment.description: Supplemental Filtration Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Supplemental Respiration Attachment.name: Supplemental Respiration Attachment
Supplemental Respiration Attachment.description: Supplemental Respiration Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Armor Attachment Pack tech.

Survival Animal Feed.name: Survival Animal Feed
Survival Animal Feed.description: Survival Animal Feed is an Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Survival Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Survival Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Survival Backpack.name: Survival Backpack
Survival Backpack.description: The Survival Backpack is a must need when taking long trips across Icarus, fit everything you need inside for survival! Innovative storage system that mitigates injuries.

Survival Kit.name: Survival Kit
Survival Kit.description: Survival Kits are a Tier 3  bandage that heals basic wounds, deep wounds, frostbite and heatstroke Status Effects . It replaces a number of basic items, but requires considerably more materials to craft.

Survival Module.name: Survival Module
Survival Module.description: This module increases the user's resistance to cold/hot environments, reducing the damage taken from Hypothermia/Hyperthermia. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Survival Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the users resistance to hyperthermia/hypothermia.

Suture Kit.name: Suture Kit
Suture Kit.description: A Suture Kit is used to treat a Deep Wound, Hemorrhage or Exotic Deep Wound.

Synthetic Enzymes.name: Synthetic Enzymes
Synthetic Enzymes.description: Synthetic Enzymes are a crafted variant of Condensed Enzymes that can be used as fuel in a Localized Terraforming Device . Unlike Condensed Enzymes , the synthetic version is less potent as a fuel but does not require constructing, placing or defending a Vapor Condenser on an Enzyme Geyser .

Tackle Box.name: Tackle Box
Tackle Box.description: The Tackle Box is a storage deployable that can be used to store a handful of lures and caught fish. Unlike other storage deployables, the Tackle Box can be picked up with items inside and does not require shelter to be used. With 3 slots for Lures and 2 slots that will halt the spoil timer of any caught fish, the Tackle Box is a handy tool for fishing adventures.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.description: Target Dummys are deployable items used to test out weapons and to see their damage output when hitting hard points and weak points.

Tea Farming Packet.name: Tea Farming Packet
Tea Farming Packet.description: The Tea Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Tea seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet.name: Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet
Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet.description: Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Teenage Caveworm Trophy.name: Teenage Caveworm Trophy
Teenage Caveworm Trophy.description: Teenage Caveworm Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Terrenus Trophy.name: Terrenus Trophy
Terrenus Trophy.description: Terrenus Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Thermos.name: Thermos
Thermos.description: The Thermos can store water without leaking, similar to the Canteen , but can also store hot drinks which can be used to raise a Prospectors core temperature when traversing the Arctic. Hot drinks also provide a unique buff that does not take up a stomach slot. Can be used to hold Hot Tea , Gorse Tea , Hot Cocoa , and Hot Coffee .

The Excavator.name: The Excavator
The Excavator.description: The Excavator is a Workshop Shovel that can be used to dig up Dirt , Sand and Ice or used to create Dirt Mounds with very high resistance to tier 6 Weather Events .
The Excavator.crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench

Thick Woven Rug.name: Thick Woven Rug
Thick Woven Rug.description: Thick Woven Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Thick Woven Rug.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Thin Woven Rug.name: Thin Woven Rug
Thin Woven Rug.description: Thin Woven Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Thin Woven Rug.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Titanium Attachment.name: Titanium Attachment
Titanium Attachment.description: Titanium Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Titanium Bolt.name: Titanium Bolt
Titanium Bolt.description: The Titanium Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Titanium Javelin.name: Titanium Javelin
Titanium Javelin.description: The Titanium Javelin is a variant of the Titanium Spear that can only be thrown and is a costly upgrade to Tier 3  Javelins.

Titanium Plate.name: Titanium Plate
Titanium Plate.description: Titanium Plate is used in a variety of high-end resources and components.

Titanium Shovel.name: Titanium Shovel
Titanium Shovel.description: The Titanium Shovel is an upgrade to the Platinum Shovel , offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to create Dirt Mounds (right-click), harvest Ice / Dirt / Sand (left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in the Arctic / Volcanic biomes on Icarus.

Titanium Sickle.name: Titanium Sickle
Titanium Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs, Reed Flower , Wheat , Carrots , etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

Titanium Tower Shield.name: Titanium Tower Shield
Titanium Tower Shield.description: The Titanium Tower Shield is crafted at the Foundry with the following resources:

Tomato Farming Packet.name: Tomato Farming Packet
Tomato Farming Packet.description: The Tomato Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Tomato seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Tool Attachment Pack.name: Tool Attachment Pack
Tool Attachment Pack.description: Tool Attachment Pack is a Tier 3  Tech needed for the Alteration Bench that allows Prospectors to alter their Tools with Attachment Packs .

Tracking Attachment.name: Tracking Attachment
Tracking Attachment.description: The Tracking Attachment is an armor alteration that boosts Critical Damage and allows active world bosses to be seen on the map.

Trajectory Module Attachment.name: Trajectory Module Attachment
Trajectory Module Attachment.description: Trajectory Module Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Ranged Attachment Pack tech.

Tree Sap.name: Tree Sap
Tree Sap.description: Tree Sap is used in crafting of items such as Epoxy , and Concrete Mix , making this early-game resource very important throughout all aspects of crafting. Tree Sap can also by found while harvesting some plants, like the palms of the Desert .

Tusker Trophy.name: Tusker Trophy
Tusker Trophy.description: Tusker Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Ubis Trophy.name: Ubis Trophy
Ubis Trophy.description: Ubis Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

UDA Comet Coal Resource Supply.name: UDA Comet Coal Resource Supply
UDA Comet Coal Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). Don't feel like running out to gather materials, and you're out of Ren? Exotics can be sold for Ren under the Workshop tab while at the station, and Ren can be obtained by completing SMPL3 missions using the CONT4CT Device .

UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply.name: UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply
UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply.description: The UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply pack is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Prospectors can also research, purchase, and request UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply packs using an Orbital Exchange Interface .

UltraMeal.name: UltraMeal
UltraMeal.description: Ultra Meal is a Food with a unique Status Effect : 'Emergency Rations'. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger . It is a one time use emergency ration to stave off starvation.

Viscid Trophy.name: Viscid Trophy
Viscid Trophy.description: Viscid Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Vitamins.name: Vitamins
Vitamins.description: Vitamins are a late-game Tier 4  preventative Medicine that increases resistance to a number of conditions and is useful in all Biomes . It does not consume a stomach slot so it can be combined with other Food buffs.
Vitamins.crafted_at: the Chemistry Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Chemistry Bench with the following resources:

Volatile Substance.name: Volatile Substance
Volatile Substance.description: Volatile Substance is a precursor resource used in making explosive Ammunition and weapons like the Frag Grenade . Volatile Substance is highly unstable and has a spoil timer of 600 seconds. Once spoiled, the item will then become Inert Volatile Substance .
Volatile Substance.crafted_at: Crafted atMortar and PestleHerbalism BenchChemistry BenchMedicine Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atMortar and PestleHerbalism BenchChemistry BenchMedicine Bench

Volcanic Animal Feed.name: Volcanic Animal Feed
Volcanic Animal Feed.description: Volcanic Animal Feed is a Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Volcanic Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Volcanic Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

Water.name: Water
Water.description: Water is a basic resource needed for survival on Icarus. It may be consumed by drinking from natural water sources such as lakes, streams, and pools found in Caves . Water from these natural sources is Tainted Water and has a 15% chance of causing dysentery. Water has various levels of purity depending on source and means of filtering. A status icon is displayed to indicate the type and status of water the prospector has consumed.

Watering Can.name: Watering Can
Watering Can.description: The Watering Can is a mid-game Tool used to water multiple crop plots/dirt mounds simultaneously. Prospectors can unlock it in Tier 2  portion of the Tech Tree after reaching Level 20. The Watering Can hold 5.0 L and can be used five times before needing to be refilled.

Watermelon Farming Packet.name: Watermelon Farming Packet
Watermelon Farming Packet.description: The Watermelon Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Watermelon seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Watermelon Lollypop.name: Watermelon Lollypop
Watermelon Lollypop.description: Watermelon Lollypop is a consumable food that provides a quick burst of energy to reduce movement speed penalties.

Waterskin.name: Waterskin
Waterskin.description: Filled at any water source, including a Rain Reservoir .

Water Barrel.name: Water Barrel
Water Barrel.description: Water Barrels are a deployable that can be connected to a water network to store 300,000 water and can output 1,000 water per second to keep the network operational.

Water Bomb.name: Water Bomb
Water Bomb.description: The Water Bomb is a Tier 2  item that will aid Prospectors in extinguishing fires. Once thrown, the Water Bomb will douse the area in water, putting out any fires. Stacks up to 5.

Water Pipe Tool.name: Water Pipe Tool
Water Pipe Tool.description: The Water Pipe Tool connects the Biofuel Water Pump / Electric Water Pump to Deployables / Water Storage to provide Water .

Water Purifier.name: Water Purifier
Water Purifier.description: Water Purifiers can be crafted from the Machining Bench with the following resources once the appropriate blueprint point has been spent:

Water Sprinkler.name: Water Sprinkler
Water Sprinkler.description: The Water Sprinkler will provide fire suppression when connected to a Water Network with a Water Pipe Tool . Can be manually activated by damaging it or by pressing F to water nearby Dirt Mounds / Crop Plots or to apply the Wet modifier to nearby prospectors and deployables, which can help counter heatwaves in Deserts .

Water Treatment Pill.name: Water Treatment Pill
Water Treatment Pill.description: Water Treatment Pills remove the risk of dysentery from Tainted and Rainwater. Use with any canteen of water using the Character Crafting interface

Water Trough.name: Water Trough
Water Trough.description: The Water Trough is a basic trough used to keep Mounts and Pets hydrated. Can be filled using a Liquid Container filled with Water or by leaving it exposed to the elements.

Water Wheel.name: Water Wheel
Water Wheel.description: The Water Wheel is a power-generating device that can be placed in any flowing body of water. Use an Electricity Tool to connect it to Benches to provide power.

Wheat Farming Packet.name: Wheat Farming Packet
Wheat Farming Packet.description: The Wheat Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Wheat seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

White Jelly Lure.name: White Jelly Lure
White Jelly Lure.description: The White Jelly Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the White Jelly Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

White Jerky.name: White Jerky
White Jerky.description: White Jerky is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Wild Boar Bait.name: Wild Boar Bait
Wild Boar Bait.description: Wild Boar Bait is a single-use Crafted Resource used to attract and capture Wild Boars when used with a Snare Trap . Wild Boar Bait does not decay and can only be used in Forest and Grassland Biomes. Stacks up to ten.

Wild Boar Trophy.name: Wild Boar Trophy
Wild Boar Trophy.description: Wild Boar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Wild Salad.name: Wild Salad
Wild Salad.description: Wild Salad is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Windmill.name: Windmill
Windmill.description: The Windmill is a faster Tier 3  equivalent of the Mortar and Pestle and an intermediate item before reaching the Material Processor on Tier 4  .

Wind Turbine.name: Wind Turbine
Wind Turbine.description: The Wind Turbine is a power generating device that must be placed outdoors. It provides 1,750 units of power when active and must also be placed in an area clear of obstructions for it to function. Use an Electricity Tool to connect it to Benches to provide power.

Wine.name: Wine
Wine.description: Wine is a mid-game beverage brewed from Wild Berry and Reed Flower that greatly increases stamina and stamina regeneration.
Wine.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Blueprint points in the Glassworking Bench

Wolf Bait.name: Wolf Bait
Wolf Bait.description: Wolf Bait is a Crafted Resource used to attract and capture wild wolves. It is a single-use item that is used with a Snare Trap and allows prospectors to tame Wolves / Snow Wolves . Wolf Bait does not decay and can only be used in Forest , Grassland and Arctic Biomes. Stacks up to ten.

Wolf Lure.name: Wolf Lure
Wolf Lure.description: The Wolf Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Wolf Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Wolf Rug.name: Wolf Rug
Wolf Rug.description: Wolf Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .
Wolf Rug.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Wolf Trophy.name: Wolf Trophy
Wolf Trophy.description: Wolf Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Workshop.name: Workshop
Workshop.description: Aboard the Space Station , Prospectors can spend Ren and Exotics to research and craft new Orbital Tech .

Workshop Repair Kit.name: Workshop Repair Kit
Workshop Repair Kit.description: The Workshop Repair Kit is obtained by purchasing a Workshop Repair Kit Bundle from the Workshop on the Space Station and consuming the bundle. Workshop Repair Kits can be used to repair Workshop Items at a powered Repair Bench .

Workshop Repair Kit Bundle.name: Workshop Repair Kit Bundle
Workshop Repair Kit Bundle.description: The Workshop Repair Kit Bundle is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station . Once opened, this bundle gives the Prospector five Workshop Repair Kit s that can be used to repair Orbital Workshop Tools/Weapons/Armor at a powered Repair Bench .

World Boss Module.name: World Boss Module
World Boss Module.description: The World Boss Module is researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Must be equipped in a envirosuit module slot after dropping into a Prospect.

Worm Scale.name: Worm Scale
Worm Scale.description: Worm Scales are a resource that drops from Caveworms . Only after completing Unearthed: Research can these scales and Poison Sacks be used to craft new weaponry at a Crafting Bench .

Xenon Backpack.name: Xenon Backpack
Xenon Backpack.description: The Xenon Backpack is designed to aid prospectors in hunting and vestige gathering, granting prospectors the ability to harvest vestiges from animals without needing to use a Taxidermy Knife ; an excellent choice for those seeking to complete the Bestiary .

Xigo Puri-tab.name: Xigo Puri-tab
Xigo Puri-tab.description: Xigo Puri-tab is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . The purification tablet will convert any Water to Treated Water in a canteen or Liquid Container . The recipe for purifying water should be available in your character Crafting menu when you have a filled canteen and a Xigo Puri-tab in your inventory.

Xigo Quick-Fix Bundle.name: Xigo Quick-Fix Bundle
Xigo Quick-Fix Bundle.description: The Xigo Quick-Fix Bundle provides 5 Xigo Quick-Fix Kits that act as Medicine to heal various types of wounds and remove afflictions.

Xigo Quick-Fix Kit.name: Xigo Quick-Fix Kit
Xigo Quick-Fix Kit.description: The Xigo Quick-Fix Kit is a consumable Medicine that heals wounds and removes certain Status Effects .

Xigo SplintX.name: Xigo SplintX
Xigo SplintX.description: Xigo Splint X is a consumable medicine to heal a Broken Leg or Sprain Status Effect and provide a +10% Falling Resistance for a duration of 5 minutes.

Xigo SplintX Bundle.name: Xigo SplintX Bundle
Xigo SplintX Bundle.description: The Xigo Splint X Bundle provides 5 Xigo Splint Xs that act as Medicine to heal a Sprain or Broken Leg Status Effect and provide +10% Falling Resistance.

Yeast Farming Packet.name: Yeast Farming Packet
Yeast Farming Packet.description: The Yeast Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Yeast seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Yeast Lure.name: Yeast Lure
Yeast Lure.description: The Yeast Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Yeast Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Zebra Trophy.name: Zebra Trophy
Zebra Trophy.description: Zebra Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary , it can also be used in tandem with other Furniture to increase the Coziness of your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff .

Anti-Parasitic Vaccine I.name: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine I
Anti-Parasitic Vaccine I.description: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine I is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unqiue Status Effect , which makes surviving the enviroment without worry possible.

Anti-Parasitic Vaccine II.name: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine II
Anti-Parasitic Vaccine II.description: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine II is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unqiue Status Effect , which makes surviving the enviroment without worry possible.

Anti-Parasitic Vaccine III.name: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine III
Anti-Parasitic Vaccine III.description: Anti-Parasitic Vaccine III is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Anti-Poison Vaccine I.name: Anti-Poison Vaccine I
Anti-Poison Vaccine I.description: Anti-Poison Vaccine I is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Anti-Poison Vaccine II.name: Anti-Poison Vaccine II
Anti-Poison Vaccine II.description: Anti-Poison Vaccine II is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Anti-Poison Vaccine III.name: Anti-Poison Vaccine III
Anti-Poison Vaccine III.description: Anti-Poison Vaccine III is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Bacterial Vaccine I.name: Bacterial Vaccine I
Bacterial Vaccine I.description: Bacterial Vaccine I is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Bacterial Vaccine II.name: Bacterial Vaccine II
Bacterial Vaccine II.description: Bacterial Vaccine II is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Bacterial Vaccine III.name: Bacterial Vaccine III
Bacterial Vaccine III.description: Bacterial Vaccine III is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Blood Thinning Vaccine I.name: Blood Thinning Vaccine I
Blood Thinning Vaccine I.description: Blood Thinning Vaccine I is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Blood Thinning Vaccine II.name: Blood Thinning Vaccine II
Blood Thinning Vaccine II.description: Blood Thinning Vaccine II is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

Blood Thinning Vaccine III.name: Blood Thinning Vaccine III
Blood Thinning Vaccine III.description: Blood Thinning Vaccine III is purchased in the Workshop on the Space Station . Vaccines are long lasting preventatives of aliments on Icarus, they provide a unique Status Effect , which makes surviving the environment without worry possible.

CHAC \"Boomstick\" Shotgun.name: CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun
CHAC \"Boomstick\" Shotgun.description: The CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun is an advanced purchaseable Shotgun with increase projectile and critical damage. It fires any Shotgun Ammunition and is comparable to other Tier 4  Firearms .

CHAC \"Sovereign\" Rifle.name: CHAC "Sovereign" Rifle
CHAC \"Sovereign\" Rifle.description: The CHAC "Sovereign" Rifle is a purchaseable rifle with a fast reload speed and moderate damage capability.

MXC Venom Arrow.name: MXC Venom Arrow
MXC Venom Arrow.description: The MXC Venom Arrow is ammunition used with a Bow . Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

MXC Venom Arrow Bundle.name: MXC Venom Arrow Bundle
MXC Venom Arrow Bundle.description: Consuming the bundle will add 5x MXC Venom Arrow to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Stone Pickaxe.name: Stone Pickaxe
Stone Pickaxe.description: The Stone Pickaxe is the first Pickaxe available to prospectors and is used to break apart mineable Minerals , reducing them to usable resources. Stone, Sulfur, Oxite, Silica, Coal, Salt, Copper, Iron, Gold, and Exotic nodes can be mined with a Stone Pickaxe. To mine Aluminium, Platinum, and Titanium, prospectors must use a Steel Pickaxe or better.

Talents.name: Talents
Talents.description: With 465 combined talents to choose from, Icarus' talent trees give prospectors the ability to construct their own unique play-styles inside of five primary Categories: Survival, Adventure, Habitation, Combat and Solo Talents Trees.

UDA Aluminium Ore Resource Supply.name: UDA Aluminium Ore Resource Supply
UDA Aluminium Ore Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). Don't feel like running out to gather materials, and you're out of Ren? Exotics can be sold for Ren under the Workshop tab while at the station, and Ren can be obtained by completing SMPL3 missions using the Short Range Radio .

UDA Clay Resource Supply.name: UDA Clay Resource Supply
UDA Clay Resource Supply.description: The Stabilized Exotics needed to research this item are exclusive to the Prometheus map.

UDA Copper Ore Resource Supply.name: UDA Copper Ore Resource Supply
UDA Copper Ore Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). Don't feel like running out to gather materials, and you're out of Ren? Exotics can be sold for Ren under the Workshop tab while at the station, and Ren can be obtained by completing SMPL3 missions using the Short Range Radio .

UDA Obsidian Resource Supply.description: The Stabilized Exotics needed to research this item are exclusive to the Prometheus map.

UDA Sulfur Ore Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). UDA Titanium Ore Resource Supply.name: UDA Titanium Ore Resource Supply
UDA Titanium Ore Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). Don't feel like running out to gather materials, and you're out of Ren? Exotics can be sold for Ren under the Workshop tab while at the station, and Ren can be obtained by completing SMPL3 missions using the Short Range Radio .

UDA Wood Resource Supply.name: UDA Wood Resource Supply
UDA Wood Resource Supply.description: Despite the usefulness of these supply packs, they are quite expensive when used often (ideal for creative builds). Don't feel like running out to gather materials, and you're out of Ren? Exotics can be sold for Ren under the Workshop tab while at the station, and Ren can be obtained by completing SMPL3 missions using the Short Range Radio .

Advanced Iron Lure.name: Advanced Iron Lure
Advanced Iron Lure.description: The Advanced Iron Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Advanced Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Aluminium Ingot.name: Aluminium Ingot
Aluminium Ingot.description: Aluminium Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Aluminium Ore .

Cold Steel Bolt.name: Cold Steel Bolt
Cold Steel Bolt.description: The Cold Steel Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . In addition to projectile damage, it has a chance to inflict a Freeze modifier that slows and damages enemies.

Cold Steel Ingot.name: Cold Steel Ingot
Cold Steel Ingot.description: Cold Steel Ingots are a refined resource crafted from Steel Ingots and Super Cooled Ice . Prospectors must use a Concrete Furnace or an Electric Furnace to refine the resources listed below into a Cold Steel Ingot.

Cold Steel Javelin.name: Cold Steel Javelin
Cold Steel Javelin.description: The Cold Steel Javelin is a variant of the Cold Steel Spear that can only be thrown. Deals frost damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic frost damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to frost. . When the Freeze modifier does proc, periodic frost damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds. Fauna with:

Copper Attachment.name: Copper Attachment
Copper Attachment.description: Copper Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Copper Bolt.name: Copper Bolt
Copper Bolt.description: The Copper Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Copper Cluster Lamp.name: Copper Cluster Lamp
Copper Cluster Lamp.description: The Copper Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Copper Geode Lamp.name: Copper Geode Lamp
Copper Geode Lamp.description: The Copper Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
Copper Geode Lamp.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

Copper Ingot.name: Copper Ingot
Copper Ingot.description: Copper Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Copper Ore .
Copper Ingot.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

Copper Monolith Lamp.name: Copper Monolith Lamp
Copper Monolith Lamp.description: The Copper Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Copper Nail.name: Copper Nail
Copper Nail.description: Copper Nail are used widely in crafting of items such as interior Interior Wood Building Pieces , and other items made of Refined Wood at the Carpentry Bench and Machining Bench .

Copper Wire.name: Copper Wire
Copper Wire.description: Copper Wire is used in a variety of high-end buildings and components and is crafted in batches of 5.

Deluxe Leather Saddle.name: Deluxe Leather Saddle
Deluxe Leather Saddle.description: The Deluxe Leather Saddle is a saddle for Mounts made with cured leather. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Iron Bolt.name: Iron Bolt
Iron Bolt.description: The Iron Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Iron Cupboard.name: Iron Cupboard
Iron Cupboard.description: The Iron Cupboard comes with 50 inventory slots and can be used to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Wood Cupboard , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside without risk of taking damage during storms.

Iron Ingot.name: Iron Ingot
Iron Ingot.description: Iron Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Iron Ore and is one of the most used materials in the Tier 2  Tech Tree and beyond.
Iron Ingot.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

Iron Javelin.name: Iron Javelin
Iron Javelin.description: The Iron Javelin is a variant of the Iron Spear that can only be thrown and is an upgrade over the Tier 1  Javelins.

Iron Lure.name: Iron Lure
Iron Lure.description: The Iron Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Iron Nail.name: Iron Nail
Iron Nail.description: Iron Nail are used widely in crafting of items such as Stone Building Pieces , and Iron Tools .

Iron Shears.name: Iron Shears
Iron Shears.description: The Iron Shears are use to shear Sheep to obtain Wool . Can cause 30-40 Melee damage

Iron Sickle.name: Iron Sickle
Iron Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs, Reed Flower , Wheat , etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.
Iron Sickle.crafted_at: the Anvil Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Anvil Bench with the following resources:

Leather Attachment.name: Leather Attachment
Leather Attachment.description: Leather Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

Leather Backpack.name: Leather Backpack
Leather Backpack.description: The Leather Backpack is a must need when mining ores, or taking long trips across Icarus, fit everything you need inside for survival!

Medium Iron Crate.name: Medium Iron Crate
Medium Iron Crate.description: A Medium Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Medium Wood Crate , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

Platinum Ingot.name: Platinum Ingot
Platinum Ingot.description: Platinum Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Platinum Ore .

Refined Gold.name: Refined Gold
Refined Gold.description: Refined Gold is the refined resource crafted from Gold Ore .

Refined Wood.name: Refined Wood
Refined Wood.description: Refined Wood is used for the construction of Interior Wood Buildings , Refined Wood Deployables, and various Tools.

Refined Wood Lure.name: Refined Wood Lure
Refined Wood Lure.description: The Refined Wood Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Refined Wood Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Rope.name: Rope
Rope.description: Intermediate crafting item used as a component of many recipes.
Rope.crafted_at: Crafted atCrafting BenchTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atCrafting BenchTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Small Iron Crate.name: Small Iron Crate
Small Iron Crate.description: A Small Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Small Wood Crate , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

Steel Bloom.name: Steel Bloom
Steel Bloom.description: Steel Bloom is a crafted resource that can be smelted in a Stone Furnace , Concrete Furnace or Electric Furnace to make a Steel Ingot . It can made made from Iron Ore or Iron Ingot and Coal Ore or Charcoal .

Steel Bolt.name: Steel Bolt
Steel Bolt.description: The Steel Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Steel Heater Shield.name: Steel Heater Shield
Steel Heater Shield.description: Background information on the Steel Heater Shield can be found here .

Steel Ingot.name: Steel Ingot
Steel Ingot.description: Steel Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Steel Bloom , prospectors may use a Stone Furnace , Concrete Furnace , or Electric Furnace .

Steel Javelin.name: Steel Javelin
Steel Javelin.description: The Steel Javelin is a variant of the Steel Spear that can only be thrown. A cheap upgrade to the Iron Javelin that increases projectile damage with a lower break chance, but is locked until prospectors reach level 20.

Steel Rebar.name: Steel Rebar
Steel Rebar.description: Steel Rebar is a critical component of Concrete Structures , and is solely used for this purpose.

Steel Screw.name: Steel Screw
Steel Screw.description: Steel Screw is used in crafting high end tools, weapons, and structures like Aluminium Buildings .

Titanium Ingot.name: Titanium Ingot
Titanium Ingot.description: Titanium Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Titanium Ore , is used widely in Tier 4  crafting recipes.

Aeroponic Crop Plot.name: Aeroponic Crop Plot
Aeroponic Crop Plot.description: The Aeroponic Crop Plot is a farming plot for growing Seeds that can later be harvested for Plant Resources once fully grown. Unless the Prospector has the Fresh Is Best talent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grown Plant Resource will eventually wither if not harvested.

Aluminium Ore.name: Aluminium Ore
Aluminium Ore.description: Aluminium Ore is a mid-game Mineral Resource . Prospectors can first utilize aluminium once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3  , when it can be crafted into upgraded Weapons like the Recurve Bow and Aluminium Arrow . It is widely used in constructs (for example, Aluminium Beam and Aluminium Door ), and in the late-game it is a vital component of Items like Composite Chest Armor .

Arctic Explorer Saddle.name: Arctic Explorer Saddle
Arctic Explorer Saddle.description: The Arctic Explorer Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has an artic theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Arctic Pelt.name: Arctic Pelt
Arctic Pelt.description: Arctic Pelts are a harvested Resource used to craft Arctic Armor , a significant upgrade over Fur Armor for prospectors adventuring in the Arctic Biomes .
Arctic Pelt.crafted_at: Crafted atTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

Art Deco Candlestick.name: Art Deco Candlestick
Art Deco Candlestick.description: The Art Deco Candlestick is an gilded item of significant worth. It can be built with either beeswax or animal fat and takes either as fuel inputs.

Bearhide Saddle.name: Bearhide Saddle
Bearhide Saddle.description: The Bearhide Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has a bear theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

Beeswax Wood Halfpieces.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpieces
Beeswax Wood Halfpieces.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked in Tier 2  of the Tech Tree . These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlier Wood versions with the inclusion of Beeswax

Beeswax Wood Halfpitches.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpitches
Beeswax Wood Halfpitches.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked in Tier 2  of the Tech Tree . These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlier Wood versions with the inclusion of Beeswax

Biofuel Extractor.name: Biofuel Extractor
Biofuel Extractor.description: This device is used to extract Exotics from Exotic Deposits. Does not require electricity, but uses biofuel instead. The Biofuel Extractor runs 33% slower than the Electric Extractor , but can be crafted earlier in the Tech Tree .

Biomore Backpack.name: Biomore Backpack
Biomore Backpack.description: The Biomore Backpack provides six inventory slots, along with 3 active auras where the prospector and nearby allies having increased physical resistance, quicker healing from bacterial, parasitic and poison modifiers, and additional health regeneration. It also has offers buffs for the wearer, reducing the stamina impact from using tools, and providing more health to downed prospectors when revived. An excellent choice for prospectors specializing in rescues.

Bone.name: Bone
Bone.description: Bone is a Animal Resource obtained from Fauna . It is also sometimes found when harvesting fish.

Bone Javelin.name: Bone Javelin
Bone Javelin.description: The Bone Javelin is a variant of the Bone Spear that can only be thrown and is an upgrade to the Wood Javelin . Despite it requiring more materials to craft, the increase in damage can mean the difference between winning and losing a fight against Icarus' fauna.

Bone Lure.name: Bone Lure
Bone Lure.description: The Bone Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Bone Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Bone Shield.name: Bone Shield
Bone Shield.description: The Bone Shield is crafted at the Character Crafting menu with the following resources:

Bone Sickle.name: Bone Sickle
Bone Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs, Reed Flower , Wheat , etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

Bramble Bush.name: Bramble Bush
Bramble Bush.description: Bramble Bush is produced by harvesting the cultivated variety of Bramble . Bramble can be grown with Seeds either harvested from wild, extracted with the Seed Extractor or using a Bramble Farming Packet from the Workshop .
harvested_from: extracted with the Seed Extractor or using a Bramble Farming Packet from the Workshop

Brutalist Candlestick.name: Brutalist Candlestick
Brutalist Candlestick.description: The Brutalist Candlestick is mode from concrete and either animal fat or beeswax. There are two varieties by selecting R. Fuel is either beeswax or animal fat.

Calf.name: Calf
Calf.description: A Calf is an imported domesticated Fauna that is brought down to the planet and raised to maturity primarily to produce Milk .

Carbon Fiber.name: Carbon Fiber
Carbon Fiber.description: While being a Tier 3  component, Carbon Fiber is only used to make Carbon Arrows , the Carbon Spear / Javelin , and the Carbon Fibre Round Shield in the Tier 3  Tech Tree; however, it is a critical component widely used in Tier 4  crafting.

Carrot.name: Carrot
Carrot.description: Carrots are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenish Hunger .

Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch.name: Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch
Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch.description: The Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch.name: Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch
Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch.description: The Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

Carved Wood Bookshelf.name: Carved Wood Bookshelf
Carved Wood Bookshelf.description: The Carved Wood Bookshelf is a decorative item.

Carved Wood Cabinet.name: Carved Wood Cabinet
Carved Wood Cabinet.description: The Carved Wood Cabinet is a decorative piece with 10 item slots.

Carved Wood Candlestick.name: Carved Wood Candlestick
Carved Wood Candlestick.description: The Carved Wood Candlestick can be crafted using either beeswax or animal fat and will take either as fuel. There are three varieties that can be selected using the 'R' key while deploying.

Carved Wood Desk Lamp.name: Carved Wood Desk Lamp
Carved Wood Desk Lamp.description: The Carved Wood Desk Lamp is a decorative item that requires 150 kwh of electricity

Carved Wood Dresser.name: Carved Wood Dresser
Carved Wood Dresser.description: The Carved Wood Dresser is a decorative item with 10 inventory slots.

Carved Wood Nightstand.name: Carved Wood Nightstand
Carved Wood Nightstand.description: The Carved Wood Nightstand is a decorative nightstand with 10 inventory slots. It has five build variants available by using the 'R' key when deploying.

Carved Wood Stool.name: Carved Wood Stool
Carved Wood Stool.description: The Carved Wood Stool is a decorative item.

Carved Wood Wardrobe.name: Carved Wood Wardrobe
Carved Wood Wardrobe.description: The Carved Wood Wardrobe is a decorative wardrobe with 10 inventory slots. It has two build variants available by selecting 'R' when deploying.

Chicken.name: Chicken
Chicken.description: A Chicken is a Transplanted farm animal that provides a source of Eggs and Raw Chicken for Food recipes.

Coal Ore.name: Coal Ore
Coal Ore.description: Coal Ore is a Mineral found on Icarus in the open and caves. It's most basic use is as a fuel in a Campfire or Stone Furnace , though this is somewhat inefficient as it is more valuable as component for crafting.

Cocoa Seed.name: Cocoa Seed
Cocoa Seed.description: Cocoa Seed are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus.

Coconut Farming Packet.name: Coconut Farming Packet
Coconut Farming Packet.description: The Coconut Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station or the Orbital Exchange Interface and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five seeds that can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop Plots .

Coffee Bean.name: Coffee Bean
Coffee Bean.description: Coffee Bean are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus.

Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone.name: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone
Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone.description: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Cold Steel Sickle.name: Cold Steel Sickle
Cold Steel Sickle.description: Cold Steel Sickle is a Tier 3  Sickle made with Cold Steel Ingots introduced on Prometheus . Due to the materials required, crafting the item requires the New Frontiers DLC.

Copper Ore.name: Copper Ore
Copper Ore.description: Copper Ore is an early-game Mineral Resource . It is widely used in the construction of Interior Wood Building Pieces , and prospectors can make extensive use of copper once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3  , as it is a crucial component in Electronics . In the late game, copper is used in various deployables like the Refrigerator and the Material Processor .

Corn.name: Corn
Corn.description: Corn are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenish Hunger .

Cow.name: Cow
Cow.description: A Cow is the mature version of a Calf that can be purchased and brought down to the planet primarily to produce Milk .

Crushed Bone.name: Crushed Bone
Crushed Bone.description: Useful alternate resource for making Epoxy .

Cryogenically Frozen Calf.name: Cryogenically Frozen Calf
Cryogenically Frozen Calf.description: The Cryogenically Frozen Calf is a deployable container containing a Calf that can be researched and obtained in the Workshop and called down to the planet using the Orbital Exchange Interface .

Cryogenically Frozen Chicken.name: Cryogenically Frozen Chicken
Cryogenically Frozen Chicken.description: The Cryogenically Frozen Chicken is a deployable container containing a Chicken that can be researched and obtained in the Workshop and called down to the planet using the Orbital Exchange Interface .

Dried Fatty T-Bone.name: Dried Fatty T-Bone
Dried Fatty T-Bone.description: Dried Fatty T-Bone is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

Exotics.name: Exotics
Exotics.description: Exotics are one the most valuable Mineral harvested on Icarus and are a potential reward for completing certain Missions / Operations . They were the reason terraforming failed on Icarus, and now their unique properties are sought after by the various Factions seeking to exploit Icarus.
harvested_from: any mission except Potshot: Training; the yield per vein
where they are located vary per mission

Fiber.name: Fiber
Fiber.description: In-game description: A bundle of soft fiber, highly useful.

Fiber Farming Packet.name: Fiber Farming Packet
Fiber Farming Packet.description: The Fiber Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Fiber seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop plots to grow Plant Resources .

Fiber Lure.name: Fiber Lure
Fiber Lure.description: The Fiber Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Fiber Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Frozen Ore.name: Frozen Ore
Frozen Ore.description: Frozen Ore is a resource produced as a by-product of mining a mineral node with a Pickaxe that has a chance to produce frozen ore, such as the Cold Steel Pickaxe or Inaris "Viridian" Pickaxe .

Fur.name: Fur
Fur.description: Fur is widely used when crafting Armors , and in certain Deployables like the Bedroll . It is a crucial ingredient in Fur Armor , which is essential equipment for prospectors venturing into the Arctic Biome for the first time.

Gold Ore.name: Gold Ore
Gold Ore.description: Gold Ore is a Mineral Resource . Prospectors can make extensive use of Gold Ore once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3  , as it is a crucial component in Electronics .

Gold Ore Lure.name: Gold Ore Lure
Gold Ore Lure.description: The Gold Ore Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Gold Ore Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Gorse Flower.name: Gorse Flower
Gorse Flower.description: Gorse Flower are a common form of Plantlife found in the Forest and Riverlands locations on Icarus.

Hydroponic Crop Plot.name: Hydroponic Crop Plot
Hydroponic Crop Plot.description: The Hydroponic Crop Plot is a farming plot for growing Seeds that can later be harvested for Plant Resources once fully grown. Unless the Prospector has the Fresh Is Best talent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grown Plant Resource will eventually wither if not harvested.

Ice Borer.name: Ice Borer
Ice Borer.description: The Ice Borer will drill super-cooled ice deposits when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can / MXC Fuel Canister . Super-cooled ice deposits can only be found on frozen lakes and rivers in the Arctic regions of Prometheus (Biomes: Glacial Cascade or Alpine Steppe - a map of Prometheus biomes can be found here .). The Ice Borer has 5 slots and will last 2 hours and 5 minutes on a full Biofuel Can .

Industrial Candlestick.name: Industrial Candlestick
Industrial Candlestick.description: The Industrial Candlestick is a decorative item from the Industrial Furniture Pack DLC.

Interior Wood Cupboard.name: Interior Wood Cupboard
Interior Wood Cupboard.description: A Interior Wood Cupboard made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to the Wood Cupboard .

Interior Wood Halfpieces.name: Interior Wood Halfpieces
Interior Wood Halfpieces.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer .

Interior Wood Halfpitches.name: Interior Wood Halfpitches
Interior Wood Halfpitches.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer .

Interior Wood Ladder.name: Interior Wood Ladder
Interior Wood Ladder.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer .

Interior Wood Railing.name: Interior Wood Railing
Interior Wood Railing.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer .

Interior Wood Railing Gate.name: Interior Wood Railing Gate
Interior Wood Railing Gate.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer .

Iron Crop Plot.name: Iron Crop Plot
Iron Crop Plot.description: The Iron Crop Plot is a farming plot for growing Seeds that can later be harvested for Plant Resources once fully grown. Unless the Prospector has the Fresh Is Best talent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grown Plant Resource will eventually wither if not harvested.

Iron Ore.name: Iron Ore
Iron Ore.description: Iron Ore is a Mineral , that allows prospectors to create Tier 2  / Tier 3  Tools and Weapons with both the Anvil Bench and Machining Bench . In addition, iron is widely used in Steel Ingot for crafting Items such as the Steel Pickaxe , and Late-game Deployables like the Fabricator / Electric Furnace .

Leather.name: Leather
Leather.description: Leather is a crucial component of many recipes in Icarus. Having a good stockpile of leather is something every prospector strive for.

Legendary Biomass.name: Legendary Biomass
Legendary Biomass.description: Legendary Biomass is an in-game currency used to craft attachments to upgrade Legendary Weapons at the Bio-lab in orbit.

Lily.name: Lily
Lily.description: A small flower which grows in groups in the Forest Biome on Icarus. They can be harvested most efficiently with the use of Sickles .

Mature Coconut.name: Mature Coconut
Mature Coconut.description: If a prospector lets a Ripe Coconut decay, it will ripen into a mature coconut.

Medium Interior Wood Crate.name: Medium Interior Wood Crate
Medium Interior Wood Crate.description: A Medium Interior Wood Crate made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to the Medium Wood Crate .

Medium Wood Crate.name: Medium Wood Crate
Medium Wood Crate.description: Larger than the Small Wood Crate , the Medium Wood Crate also possesses an increased inventory space with 20 slots. Like most other Deployables , this must be under Shelter or it will be destroyed when exposed to Weather events. It is possible to loot the contents if this crate is destroyed, but only for a limited time.

Medium Wood Hedgehog.name: Medium Wood Hedgehog
Medium Wood Hedgehog.description: The Medium Wood Hedgehog are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment.

Miasmic Javelin.name: Miasmic Javelin
Miasmic Javelin.description: The Miasmic Javelin is a variant of the Miasmic Spear that can only be thrown. Deals poison damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic poison damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to poison. . When the Miasma modifier does proc, periodic poison damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds. Fauna with:

Miasmic Sickle.name: Miasmic Sickle
Miasmic Sickle.description: Miasmic Sickle is a Tier 4  Sickle made with Distilled Miasmic Coating derived from Crystallized Miasma found in the Swamps on Prometheus . Due to the materials required, crafting the item requires the New Frontiers DLC.

Milk.name: Milk
Milk.description: Milk is a late-game resource obtained from mature Cows raised from juvenile Calves purchased from the orbital Workshop . Calves must be raised to adulthood using similar mechanics to taming Mounts including feeding, watering and providing a bed for the animal to sleep on.

Mining Armature.name: Mining Armature
Mining Armature.description: The Mining Armature is an electro-mechanical gauntlet that serves as a Pickaxe for mining or for use in melee combat where it can inflict considerable damage to armored targets. It can be purchased in the Bio-lab and upgraded with various attachments.

Mushroom.name: Mushroom
Mushroom.description: Mushrooms can only be harvested in caves in the Arctic biomes, and are harvested by hand. Caves with Mushrooms are almost exclusively caves with pit traps, this can make them easier to find on interactive maps. Also the Mushroom Farming Packet can be purchased in the Workshop . Consuming this item will yield 5 Mushrooms.

NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade.name: NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade
NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade.description: The NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade is an upgrade for the CONT4CT Device deployed in an Open World map that visually upgrades the screens and provides a Bosses tab that provides information on the currently active world bosses.

Noxious Logging Inhaler.name: Noxious Logging Inhaler
Noxious Logging Inhaler.description: The Noxious Logging Inhaler is a Medicine that allows Infected Bark to be harvested when chopping trees and also boosts felling damage and resistance to collision damage from falling trees.

Noxious Mining Inhaler.name: Noxious Mining Inhaler
Noxious Mining Inhaler.description: The Noxious Mining Inhaler is a Medicine whose effects allow Noxious Crust to be harvested when mining and add a small boost to mining yield and radius.

Platinum Ore.name: Platinum Ore
Platinum Ore.description: Platinum Ore is a mid-game Mineral Resource , and can be utilized by prospectors after they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3  in the Tech Tree . Platinum is required for a number of upgraded Tools and Weapons , including the Platinum Spear and Platinum Sickle .

Platinum Weave.name: Platinum Weave
Platinum Weave.description: Platinum Weave is a Tier 3  crafted resource used for various items including armor, animal items, rugs, fishing lures and furniture.
Platinum Weave.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

Poison Sack.name: Poison Sack
Poison Sack.description: Poison Sacks are a resource that drops from Caveworms . Only after completing Unearthed: Research can these sacks and Caveworm Scales be used to craft new weaponry at a Crafting Bench .
harvested_from:
le with care
